CARD_SKILL.TEXT: At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. If the enemy Character is an NPC, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE +1. If this happens, a random allied card gets SIZE -1.
At the start of the turn, allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the number of allied cards get ATK +1/STA +2.
At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
At the start of the turn, cards in your Field with the lowest SIZE get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.

At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower that does not belong to this Character's faction gets ATK -2/STA -2. If this Character and all enemy Followers belong to the same faction, two random enemy Followers get STA -1.
At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Field, the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2. If there is one enemy card, it gets STA -2
At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with a SIZE that is less than or equal to half (rounding up) of the total SIZE of the first two cards in your Hand gets ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.

At the start of the turn, if the difference in SIZE between the cards in Slot 1 and Slot 2 of your Hand is odd, all allied Followers get STA +2. If the difference is even, allied Followers get ATK +2.
At the start of the turn, if this Character's LIFE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand are both odd or both even, this Character gets LIFE +3.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE decreased by the difference in SIZE between the first two cards in your Hand.
At the start of the turn, if Slot 3 in the enemy Field is empty, a random enemy Follower is moved there. A Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field gets STA -3.

At the start of the turn, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets ATK/STA decreased by half (rounding up) of the combined SIZE of the first allied Follower and a Follower in Slot 4 in your Field. (An empty Slot counts as having a SIZE of 0.)

At the start of the turn, if Slot 5 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field is moved to Slot 5 and gets STA +5. If Slot 1 in your Field is empty, a Follower in Slot 5 in your Field is moved to Slot 1 and gets STA +5.
At the start of the turn, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -1.

At the start of the turn, if there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, the first three cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of sent cards (rounding up).
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF decreased by half of the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand with the lowest SIZE (rounding down).
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers with a SIZE less than your first Follower's SIZE get ATK -1/STA -2
At the start of the turn, if all cards in your Field and the first card in your Hand are Crux cards, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.

At the start of the turn, a Follower in Slot 5 in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and then a random enemy card is moved to the next empty Slot in the enemy Field. If the card is moved to Slot 5, the card is destroyed.

At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in the enemy Hand, the first allied card with the higher SIZE gets SIZE changed to equal the difference in SIZE between the first and second cards in the enemy Hand.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Darklore Follower with a SIZE of 9 or less is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1.5 times the sent card's SIZE (rounding down).

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on the faction of the first card in your Hand:  ● Vita: ATK +1/STA +2  ● Academy: STA +3  ● Crux: DEF +1  ● Darklore: SIZE -2
At the start of the turn, the number of Crux cards and non-Crux cards in the enemy Hand and Field are compared. A random allied Crux Follower gets STA increased by the higher number.
At the start of the turn, if there are cards in the enemy Hand and Field from at least two factions, a random card in your Hand gets SIZE -2.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3. If this happens, this card gets LIFE +1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
At the start of the turn, the first Darklore card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. A random enemy Follower's ATK/STA are decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).

At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Hand is removed from the game. If the Turn Number is odd, the first Spell in the enemy Grave is removed from the game.
At the start of the turn, if there are at least two allied Followers, this Character gets LIFE -1, and then a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get STA increased by their difference in SIZE.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the difference between its SIZE and DEF (rounding up).
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, the enemy Follower with the highest DEF gets DEF =0.
At the start of the turn, if there are two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, this Character gets LIFE increased by half of their SIZE (rounding up).
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of allied Followers.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower gets an additional STA +1.
At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is a multiple of three, two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/STA +3 and this Character gets LIFE +2.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 4).

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to the next empty Slot. If this happens, the moved Follower's ATK is increased by the new Slot number. If the Follower starts in Slot 5, it is moved to the first empty Slot.
At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK increased by the number of different SIZES in your Hand.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, the Follower also gets STA +1.
At the start of the turn, two random Followers in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1, and then two random allied Followers get STA +1.
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 5 get STA -2.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE:  ● 3 or greater: ATK -2  ● Less than 3: STA -2
At the start of the turn, a random Crux Follower in your Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on its SIZE:  ● 3 or greater: ATK +2  ● Less than 3: STA +3
At the start of the turn, if the number of cards in your Hand is even, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1.
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 2, 3, and 4 get STA -2, and a random enemy Follower gets STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its DEF:  ● 1 or greater: DEF -1/STA -1  ● 0 or less: ATK -2/STA -2
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its DEF:  ● 1 or greater: ATK +2/ STA +2  ● 0 or less: DEF +1/STA +1
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets one of the following effects applied depending on its STA:  ● 10 or greater: STA -4  ● 9 or less: ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1
At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two random allied Followers get ATK +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random allied Follower gets STA +2.

At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets DEF decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 3, rounding up).

At the start of the turn, the first Academy Spell in your Hand with a SIZE less than the difference between 9 and your Field Size is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the sent card's SIZE.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2 .
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2, and then is sent to the top of your Deck. Next, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2.

At the start of the turn, if there are at least two cards in your Hand with the same SIZE, the cards in your Hand with the highest SIZE that meet that condition are sent to the bottom of your Deck. This Character gets LIFE increased by half of the SIZE of the sent cards (by a maximum of 4, rounding up).

At the start of the turn, the first card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (by a maximum of 4, rounding down).
At the start of the turn, a random allied Vita Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, if the ones digit of the Turn Number is at least 1, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/DEF =1. That Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal 10 minus the ones digit of the Turn Number.

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =1/DEF =0/STA =9.

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =7/DEF =0/STA =2.

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to your Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =3/DEF =0/STA =3. That Follower gets this skill: "Before this card attacks, the defender gets SIZE +1, and then this skill is removed."

At the start of the turn, allied cards with "Homunculus Escort" in the name are sent to the Grave. Next, a Follower named "Homunculus Escort" is created in the last empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF =0/STA =5.

At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE:  ● 26 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.  ● 16-20: This Character gets LIFE +1.  ● 9 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number and number of cards in your Hand are both odd or both even, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of at least 2 gets SIZE -2.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE =1/ATK =5/DEF = 0/STA =7.
At the start of the turn, if there are no Academy cards in your Hand and Field, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets STA +3. If the Turn Number is even, that Follower also gets ATK +1.
At the start of the turn, the first card in the enemy Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, the first card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Academy Follower gets SIZE -1/STA +2.
At the start of the turn, two random allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the difference between the lowest SIZE in your Field and the highest SIZE in the enemy Field.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with a SIZE of 5 or less gets SIZE +1/ATK +2/DEF +1/STA +2.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets DEF/STA decreased by the number of Followers in your Hand.
턴 개시시 자신무덤의 카드가 3장 이상일 경우 자신핸드 맨앞 카드 1을 자신덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다. 그랬을 경우 랜덤한 상대필드 추종자 1의 공/방/체 -1 상대필드에 사립/다크로어 소속 추종자가 있을경우 추가로 해당 추종자의 공/체 -1
턴 개시시 랜덤한 자신핸드 추종자 1의 공/체 +1 그랬을 경우 랜덤한 자신 필드 추종자 1의 공/체 +1/+2
At the start of the turn, a number of Followers in your Hand equal to the SIZE of the first card in your Hand get ATK +1/STA +1. (The Followers are selected from left to right.)

At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the enemy Character's LIFE:  ● 31 or more: The enemy Character gets LIFE -2.  ● 20-25: A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2.  ● 10-15: A random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2.  ● 6 or less: The enemy Character gets LIFE =1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3. Next, if this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, a random enemy Follower gets STA -2.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK -2/STA -3 instead.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the Follower gets ATK+2/STA +3 instead.
At the start of the turn, this Character gets LIFE +1. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2 instead.

At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand:  ● 1: You get Shuffles +1.  ● 2: A random allied Follower gets ATK +3/STA +3.  ● 3: A random allied Follower gets DEF +1/STA +1.  ● 4: Two random allied Followers get ATK +1/STA +1.  ● 5: This Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2 and its skills are removed. If the Follower had any skills removed, it gets SIZE -1.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:  ● 1-3: STA +3  ● 3-5: ATK +2

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:  ● 1-3: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 3-5: ATK +2/STA +1

At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:  ● 1-3: ATK -1/STA -2  ● 3-5: ATK -2/STA -1

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:  ● 1-3: STA +4  ● 3-5: SIZE -1/ATK +1

At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field, and then the first enemy card with a Slot number that matches the Slot number of an allied card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower is moved to a random empty Slot in your Field. The Follower gets the following effects applied depending on its new Slot number:  ● 1-3: STA +3  ● 3-5: ATK +2

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, that Follower gets an additional ATK +1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets DEF -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, the first Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA -2 (to a minimum of 1).

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA -2.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -1/STA -2. If there are fewer cards in your Field than the enemy Field, that Follower gets an additional ATK -1. If there are at least as many cards in your Hand as the enemy Hand, that Follower gets an additional STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, all Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, that Follower gets an additional DEF +1/STA +1.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random enemy Follower gets DEF -1/STA -2.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random allied Follower gets STA +1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower gets ATK +2/STA +2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random enemy Follower gets STA -3 and a random other enemy Follower gets STA -1.

At the start of the turn, one of the following effects is applied depending on the number of skills in your Field:  ● 2 or less: A random enemy Follower's skills are removed.  ● More than 2: A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of skills in your Field (rounding up).

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Council" in the name gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Vita Followers:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK+1/STA +2

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Academy Followers:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK+1/STA +2

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Seeker" in the name gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Crux Followers:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK+1/STA +2

At the start of the turn, a random allied Follower with "Witch" in the name gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Darklore Followers:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK+1/STA +2

At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a random Follower in your Hand/Field and the first Follower in your Deck get ATK +1/STA +1, then your Character gets LIFE +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random Follower in the enemy Hand/Field and the first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1, then the enemy Character gets LIFE -1. Additional effects occur if there are other Muspelheim cards.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. It gets an additional STA +2 if the top card in your Deck is a Follower.

At the start of the turn, if there are five cards in your Hand, the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, all Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get ATK -1. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK increased by 1 plus the total ATK reduction (by a maximum of 3). If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, if the top card in the enemy Deck is a Spell, it gets SIZE +1. The first card in your Deck gets SIZE -1; if it is a Follower, it gets an additional ATK +1/STA +1. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, the following effect is applied twice: "A random Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK -1/STA -1 (to a minimum STA of 1)." If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to this Character's Faction, this Character gets LIFE +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2. The first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets DEF +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to your Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +2.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Vita Follower, a random Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is an Academy Follower, a random Follower in your Deck gets DEF +1/STA +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Crux Follower, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If your Field does not contain a Follower, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2. If there are no Followers in your Hand or Field, the first Follower in your Deck gets ATK +1/STA +1. If it is a Darklore Follower, it gets an additional SIZE -1.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +3 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
At the start of the turn, a Follower named "GS Soldier" is created at the bottom of your Deck. If this Character's LIFE is less than the enemy Character's LIFE, your Character gets LIFE +1.
At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is at least 5, a random Follower in your Field gets SIZE -1. If that Follower has "Dress Up" in the name, it gets an additional ATK +2/STA +2.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by the number of Followers in your Field. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets STA decreased by the same amount (to a minimum of 1).

At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, two Followers named "Zombie" are created at the top of your Grave. If the Turn Number is even, the first Darklore Follower in your Grave is removed from the game, and then two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If this Character's LIFE is 10 or less, a random Follower in your Hand gets ATK +2/STA +2.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field that has skills and a random Follower in the enemy Deck that has skills get skills removed and replaced with the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card's original skills are restored. Its other skills are removed."

At the start of the turn, Crux cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand. Any sent Followers get ATK +1/STA +1. If no cards are sent, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, enemy Followers in Slots 1, 2, and 3 get STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
At the start of the turn, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1.
At the start of the turn, if your Field SIZE is greater than the enemy Field SIZE, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1.
At the start of your turn, if there are any allied Followers, a random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +2. Otherwise, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -1/STA -2.

If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, the first Follower in the enemy Deck gets ATK decreased by the number of Followers in your Field (by a maximum of 3). A random Follower in your Field gets ATK increased by the total ATK decrease. If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. At the start of the turn, if the Turn Number is odd, a Follower named "GS Soldier" is created on top of your Grave. The first Follower in your Deck gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Darklore Followers in the top three cards of your Grave.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck. The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave.

If the Turn Number is even, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2. If this happens, that Follower gets deactivated. If there are no Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets SIZE +1.

At the start of the turn, the Follower in the enemy Field with the highest ATK gets deactivated. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK -2. If there are no Followers in the enemy Field, a random Follower in your Field gets STA +2.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with 7 or less ATK gets its ATK doubled. If this happens, that Follower is deactivated. Otherwise, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2.

At the start of the turn, a random enemy Follower is deactivated. If this happens, that Follower and any adjacent Followers get ATK -1. A random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by the total ATK decrease.

At the start of the turn, the third card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random card in the enemy Hand or Field with the same SIZE as the removed card is sent to the Grave.

At the start of the turn, a random card in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by half of the SIZE of the removed card (rounding up).
At the start of the turn, if the opponent has 3 or more Shuffles, the opponent gets Shuffles -1. A random Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.

At the start of the turn, if your Hand contains at least two cards with the same SIZE, those cards are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by 1 plus half of the SIZE of the sent cards (rounding down).

턴 개시시 현재 턴 수만큼 랜덤한 상대필드 추종자1과 인접한 추종자 수로 나눈 만큼(내림) 해당 추종자와 인접한 추종자의 체력 감소.(최대3)
턴 개시시 현재 턴의 1의 자리수 만큼 랜덤한 자신필드 추종자1과 인접한 추종자로 나눈만큼(올림) 해당 추종자와 인접한추종자의 체력증가(최대 3)그랬을경우 4-해당 추종자의 수 만큼 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 체력이 감소한다.
턴 개시시 자신필드 "천리교도 에프리바"를 모두 무덤으로 보낸다. 자신필드 빈 마지막 슬롯에 "천리교도 에프리바"를 배치한다
턴 개시시 현재 턴수와 상대필드 카드 사이즈 총합의 홀짝이 일치할 경우 자신 라이프 -1. 자신핸드 추종자 전체 체력+1. 일치하지 않을 경우 상대 라이프 -3.(게임 개시시에는 발동하지 않습니다.)

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on its DEF:  ● 1 or greater: DEF -1/STA -1  ● 0 or less: ATK -2/STA -2

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +2 and the first card in your Hand is sent to the top of your Deck. If the sent card belongs to this Character's faction, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2. If the number of cards in your Deck is less than or equal to the number of cards in the enemy Deck, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -1/STA -2. If all cards in your Hand and Field belong to this Character's faction and there are at least five cards in your Grave, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, this Character gets LIFE +1. The enemy Character gets LIFE -1. A random Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. A random Follower in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1. A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Field with "Witch" in the name gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Darklore Followers:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 2 or more: SIZE -1/ATK+1/STA +2
At the start of the turn, the first Follower in the enemy Field is swapped with the first Spell in the enemy Hand. The swapped Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
At the start of the turn, the first Follower in the enemy Field is swapped with the first Spell in the enemy Hand. The swapped Spell gets SIZE +1. The swapped Follower gets ATK -1/STA -1.
At the start of the turn, up to two Spells in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.
At the start of the turn, up to two Followers in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of sent cards.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.

At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by 2 minus the number of enemy Shuffles. A random Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of enemy Shuffles.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom two cards of your Deck.
At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by the number of Followers in the bottom three cards of your Deck.
At the start of the turn, the last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck.

At the start of the turn, the last Follower in your Deck gets ATK +4/STA +4. All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by half of the number of sent cards (rounding down) .
At the start of the turn, if there are 20 or fewer cards in the enemy Deck, the enemy Character gets LIFE -2.
At the start of the turn, if there are 18 or fewer cards in the enemy Deck, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.
At the start of the turn, if there are at least 12 cards in the enemy Grave, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave.
At the start of the turn, if there are at least 15 cards in the enemy Grave, two random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.
At the start of the Turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by half of its SIZE (rounding up).
At the start of the Turn, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF/STA decreased by half of its SIZE (rounding up).

At the start of the Turn, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets STA increased by half of the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).

At the start of the Turn, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest STA is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. The last Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding down).
At the start of the Turn, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets its SIZE halved (rounding up).
At the start of the Turn, the last Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, gets its SIZE halved (rounding up), and gets ATK +2.
턴 개시시 자신필드 랜덤한 추종자 1을 랜덤한 빈 자신필드 슬롯으로 옮긴다. 그랬을경우 이동한 슬롯의 번호에 따라 이하의 효과를 적용한다. 1~3 : 체력 +3. 3~5 : 공/체 +2

턴 개시시 자신무덤 맨 위의 카드를 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다. 상대필드 특수능력이 있는 추종자 전체 모든 특수능력을 잃는다. 해당추종자의 공/체 -2.

턴 개시시 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/체 -1. 턴 수가 1턴일경우 자신 덱 카드 전체 사이즈 -1. 추종자들은 추가로 공/체 +1/+2.
턴 개시 시 자신 핸드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 사이즈 +1, 공/방/체 +1. 자신 핸드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 체력은 자신 사이즈만큼 증가한다. 상대 필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 사이즈 -1, 공/방/체 -1
턴 개시시 공/방/체의 합이 20이 넘어가는 상대 필드 랜덤한 추종자1의 공/체 +2/+2 공/방/체 합이 30이 넘어갈경우 그 추종자를 파괴한다.
턴 개시 시 상대 필드 추종자 전체 증가된 수치는 원래 수치 -2가 된다. 자신 필드 추종자 전체 감소한 수치는 원래 수치 +2가 된다. 자신 무덤에 있는 카드 전체 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다.

A random enemy Follower gets STA -4. Next, if your Character has "Sita" in the name, a random other enemy Follower gets STA -2; if there are no other enemy Followers, that Follower gets an additional STA -2.
Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
If there are allied Followers with "Cook Club" in the name, two random allied Vita Followers get SIZE +1 and ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +2.
If there is a Vita Follower in Slot 3 in your Field, it gets ATK/STA increased by the difference between its SIZE and the SIZE of a card in Slot 3 in the enemy Field.
Your Character gets LIFE increased by the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE (by a maximum of 5).
The first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down).

If the difference between your Character's LIFE and the enemy Character's LIFE is 25 or less, both Characters get LIFE changed to equal the average of the two (rounding up). Next, starting from Slot 1, cards are sent to the Grave from the Field that has the most cards until there are an equal number of cards in both Fields. If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. Otherwise, all cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave.
The first allied Vita Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE -2/STA+2.
Two random allied Followers get STA increased by 1 plus the number of different SIZES in your Hand.
A random enemy Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of Vita Followers in your Hand.
Two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the number of allied Followers with "Maid" in the name.
Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.

If there are allied Followers with "Maid" in the name, all allied Followers get SIZE =1. Next, an affected Follower gets SIZE increased by the total SIZE reduction and gets STA increased by half of its new SIZE (rounding down).
The first allied Academy Follower with the highest SIZE is sent to the Grave, and then your Character gets LIFE increased by twice that card's SIZE.
The first allied Academy Follower gets DEF changed to equal the number of Academy cards in your Hand.
Three random enemy Followers get SIZE +1.
If you have an Academy Character, two random enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
The first enemy Follower and a Follower in Slot 3 in your Field get SIZE, ATK, DEF, and STA swapped.
Enemy cards with a SIZE of 3 or less, as well as allied non-Academy cards, are sent to the Grave.
Cards in Slot 3 in both Fields have their SIZES compared. The card with the smaller SIZE is destroyed. If both cards have the same SIZE, the card in Slot 3 in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.
Allied Followers with "Knight" in the name get STA +3. If your Character has "Luthica" in the name, the affected cards get an additional ATK +3.
Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
The first allied Follower and the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE are deactivated.
Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of cards in your Hand.

The first allied Follower is deactivated and sent to the enemy Field. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the sent Follower's SIZE (rounding up), and then the sent Follower gets SIZE =1.
A random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the number of allied cards minus 1 and gets STA increased by the 1 plus the number of allied cards.
If your Field and the enemy Field contain the same number of cards, two random enemy cards are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
The first enemy Follower with the highest DEF greater than 0 gets DEF decreased by twice its DEF.
A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Grave with "Knight" in the name, and then all cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
All Followers in your Field and all cards in the enemy Field are deactivated. Crux Followers in your Field get SIZE -1/STA +2.
Two random allied Darklore Followers get STA +3.
Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.

All allied Followers get stats decreased to SIZE =1/ATK =1/STA =1. The first allied Darklore Follower with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/STA increased by the total that each was decreased, respectively.
The first allied Darklore Follower gets STA =1. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the STA reduction (by a maximum of 10).
Your Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy Character gets LIFE -4.
Allied Followers with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name get ATK +3.
A Darklore Follower in Slot 3 in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the combined DEF of all allied Followers (by a maximum of 5).
Enemy Followers with a total DEF/STA that are higher than the enemy Character's LIFE get DEF decreased by half of the enemy Character's LIFE (rounding down).

If you have a Darklore Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest STA is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).

If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2. If you do not have a Darklore Character, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/DEF -2. If the enemy Field has two or fewer Followers, those Followers get ATK -1/DEF -1.

If there are allied Followers with "Council" in the name, two random enemy Followers have one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied Vita Followers:  ● 1: ATK -2  ● 2: STA -3  ● 3 or more: ATK -2/DEF -1/STA -2
The first allied Follower with "Council" in the name is deactivated. If this happens, the enemy Follower with the highest SIZE gets STA decreased by 1 plus the deactivated card's ATK.
If the number of allied Followers with "Lib." in the name is equal to or greater than the number of enemy Spells, a random enemy Spell is moved to the first empty Slot in your Field.
The first Spell in the enemy Hand with a SIZE of 3 or less gets SIZE increased by the number of allied Vita Followers.
A Follower in Slot 2 in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +5. Next, if you do not have a Vita Character, the Follower's skill is removed.
If your Character has "Sita" in the name, it gets LIFE +4.

A random enemy Follower with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand (or Hand plus 1 if you have a Vita Character) is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then gets SIZE -1.
The first allied Academy Follower with the lowest STA is sent to the Grave. The first enemy Follower with an ATK greater than the sent card's STA gets ATK decreased by the sent card's STA.
Two random enemy Followers get STA -4 or STA -2. (50% chance)
Allied Academy Followers with a Slot number equal to their SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
The first Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/DEF -2.
If the second Follower in your Field is an Academy Follower, it gets DEF/STA changed to equal the DEF/STA of a Follower in Slot 1 in your Field.
Enemy Followers with the highest SIZE get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their Slot number.

If you have an Academy Character, the enemy card with the highest SIZE in Slots 2 and 4 is destroyed. Otherwise, it is sent to the Grave. Next, the enemy card with the lowest SIZE in those Slots is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. (An empty Slot is considered to have a SIZE of 0. No effect if both Slots contain cards with the same SIZE.)
If there are any allied Followers, and if the enemy Field SIZE is odd, a random enemy Follower is destroyed. If the enemy Field SIZE is even, a random allied Follower is sent to the Grave.
A random enemy Follower that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
Allied Followers with "Seeker" in the name get ATK +2/STA +1.

Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half of the number of cards in your Hand (rounding down). If this happens, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand.

All allied Followers are sent to the Grave. The first Crux Follower in your Hand with a SIZE of up to 3 plus the number of sent cards is sent to Slot 4 in your Field. Next, the Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of Crux cards in your Grave (rounding up).
If the total SIZE of cards in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field is at least 6, the card in Slot 2 in the enemy Field is destroyed.

Up to four cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the bottom. If this happens, two random Crux Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of removed cards.
The first Spell in your Hand is swapped with the first Spell in the enemy Hand.
The first two cards in your Hand and the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave. (No effect if neither Hand has enough cards.)
Allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK +1/STA +3. Your Character gets LIFE -1.
The first allied Follower with the lowest SIZE and "Witch" in the name gets ATK =1/STA =1 and the first enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half of the total ATK/STA reduction (rounding up).
All enemy Followers with a SIZE less than the SIZE of an allied Darklore Follower with the highest SIZE get DEF -2/STA -2.
Two random allied Darklore Followers get STA increased by half of your Hand SIZE (rounding up).

Allied and enemy cards with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of cards in your Hand and Field are sent to the owners' Graves. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent enemy cards.
All allied and enemy Followers get ATK +1.
All allied and enemy Followers get DEF +1.
All allied and enemy Followers get STA +1.

If there are at least six cards in your Grave, all cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least three cards were sent, including at least one Follower, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and then this card is removed from the game.
Allied Vita Followers get STA +3. If there are ten or fewer cards in your Deck, allied Vita Followers get an additional STA +2.
If there are allied Vita Followers with "Council" in the name and allied Vita Followers without "Council" in the name, two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
A random enemy Follower with skills has its skills removed.
The first three cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For each Vita Follower sent, your Character gets LIFE +3. Next, this card is removed from the game.
If there are Vita Followers and non-Vita Followers in your Grave, all enemy Spells are sent to the Grave. If there are no enemy Spells, this card is deactivated instead of being sent to the Grave.
The first Vita Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then gets SIZE =1-2, ATK +3-5, and STA +3-5. (Randomly)
Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +4/STA -1.
Two random enemy Followers get DEF decreased by the number of Spells in the enemy Hand.
Two random allied Followers get STA increased by their SIZE.
If there are allied Academy Followers with "Maid" in the name and allied Academy Followers without "Maid" in the name, two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
If there are any enemy Spells, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave.

If there are any Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. If this happens and this card has a SIZE of at least 2, a copy of this card is created on top of the enemy Deck and gets SIZE -1. If a Follower was sent to the Grave, this card is removed from the game.

All Academy cards in your Hand get SIZE -1 and are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, all enemy cards are deactivated, and then the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
A random allied Crux Follower gets SIZE -1-3 and ATK +1-3. (Randomly)
If there are allied Crux Followers with "Seeker" in the name and allied Crux Followers without "Seeker" in the name, two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
If there are at least six Crux cards in your Grave, a random allied Follower gets STA +6.

A random enemy Follower with a SIZE less than the first allied Follower's SIZE is deactivated and sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. That Follower gets this skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed."
If there is one allied Follower, that Follower gets ATK =0/DEF =0, and then two enemy Followers get ATK decreased by half of the ATK/DEF reduction (rounding down).
All cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If at least two cards were sent, a random enemy Follower with a SIZE of at least 4 is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.

One of the following effects is applied depending on the number of cards in your Deck:  ● At least 10: Two random Followers in your Field get DEF +2/STA +2. If they belong to Crux, they get an additional ATK +2.  ● 9 or less: Two random Followers in your Field get SIZE +1/ATK +6/STA +6.
A Follower in Slot 3 of the enemy Field gets ATK/STA decreased by its SIZE.
If there are allied Darklore Followers with "Witch" in the name and allied Darklore Followers without "Witch" in the name, two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
If there are at least seven Darklore Followers in your Grave, all enemy Followers get DEF -2/STA -2.
Six Spells in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the bottom. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets SIZE +3.
The bottom three cards in your Deck are sent to the Grave. For each Darklore Follower sent, the following effect occurs: "A random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1."

If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE -1 and a random enemy Follower gets STA -5. If there are least eight cards in your Grave, a random other enemy Follower gets STA -5 and two random Spells are removed from your Grave; if there are no other enemy Followers, that Follower gets an additional STA -5.
All enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the total number of Spells in both Hands. The first Spells in your Hand, the enemy Hand, and all Spells in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK increased by twice their DEF and STA decreased by half of their DEF (rounding down).

The first allied Follower with "Council Maron" or "Seeker Smartylane" in the name is sent to your Grave, and then a corresponding card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" or "Dress Up Smartylane" in the name is sent to your first empty Slot. That Follower gets SIZE =5/ATK +2/STA +4.
The first allied Vita Follower is moved to Slot 5 in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE of cards in Slots 2 and 4 in your Field.
The first enemy card with a SIZE equal to the sum of this card's SIZE and the number of empty Slots in your Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK/STA increased by their difference in SIZE (by a maximum of 4).

If there are any allied Followers, the first card in your Hand is sent to the Grave, and then for each remaining card in your Hand, a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK decreased by the number of cards in your Hand, and then this card is removed from the game.
The first Crux card in your Hand is sent to your Grave. If this happens, a random allied Crux Follower gets ATK +4/STA +4.
If you have a Crux Character, a random enemy Spell is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.

If either or both of the first two cards in your Deck belong to your Character's faction, the cards that belong to your Character's faction are sent to the first empty Slots in your Field. The cards that do not are sent to the Grave. The cards sent to your Field get SIZE changed to equal this card's SIZE, and then this card is removed from the game.
Two random Darklore cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the difference between its ATK and STA.

The first Darklore Follower in your Grave is removed from the game. If this happens, and if there is an empty Slot in your Field, allied Followers with "Scardel", "Crescent", or "Flina" in their name get SIZE =1. If that happens, a new copy of the removed card is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE/ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE reduction.
If you have a Darklore Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest sum of ATK and STA gets SIZE/ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in both Hands (to a minimum SIZE of 1).
The first other allied Card is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand. If this happens, the first enemy card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
All enemy Followers get ATK -1. A random allied Vita Follower gets STA increased by the total ATK reduction.
The first allied Vita Follower with the lowest SIZE gets ATK/DEF/STA swapped with the ATK/DEF/STA of the first enemy Follower with an equal SIZE.
The first enemy Follower's first skill is added to a random allied Follower that does not have a skill.
Two random allied Followers get DEF =0 and get their STA increased by twice their change in DEF.
If you have a Vita Character and there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Spell is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.

All allied Followers get one or more of the following effects for each allied Follower that meets the following conditions (Each effect stacks.):  ● Cook Club: SIZE -1/STA +1  ● Lib.: ATK +1/STA +1  ● Council: DEF +1/STA +1  ● Other Vita Followers: ATK +1/DEF +1

The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name gets ATK +2/STA +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the first Academy Follower in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
If there are allied Followers with "Dress Up" in the name, a random enemy card is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
All Academy Followers in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each sent Follower, a Spell in the enemy Hand gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
If you have an Academy Character, a random enemy Follower with a SIZE of 4 or less gets SIZE +2. If the Follower's new SIZE is at least 5, it gets STA -3.
All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the number of Followers in both Fields, and all allied Followers get STA decreased by the number of enemy Followers.

If you have an Academy Character, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE other than 1 gets SIZE =1, and then two random enemy Followers get ATK/STA decreased by the enemy Follower's former SIZE.

If you have an Academy Character, the first allied Academy Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK =1/STA =1. Next, if your Character has "Cinia" in the name, a random enemy Follower that has a STA of at least 2 and possesses a skill gets ATK =1/STA =1.
Crux Followers in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the last allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by twice the number of sent cards.

The last two Crux cards in your Hand are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, two random enemy Followers are deactivated. If there are allied cards with "Knight" or "Blue Cross" in the name, those enemy Followers also get STA -2.
Allied Followers with a SIZE equal to or greater than the SIZE of the enemy Follower with the lowest SIZE get ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
Two random enemy non-Crux Followers get ATK -2/STA -2. If there are three or fewer cards in your Hand, the top cards in your Deck are sent to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand.
If there are any allied Followers, all cards in your Hand are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding up).
Cards in both Hands that do not belong to the corresponding Character's faction are sent to the Grave.

If you have a Crux Character, cards in your Hand are sent to empty Slots in your Field in sequential order until your Field is full or your Hand runs out of cards. If this happens, those cards get SIZE = 2-3 (at random).
All cards in your Hand are sent to the Grave. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest total ATK/STA gets ATK/STA decreased by 1.5 times the number of sent cards (rounding up).
A random active allied Darklore Follower is deactivated and gets ATK +3/STA +1. If the Follower has "GS" in the name, it gets an additional STA +2.
All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the Turn Number divided by the number of enemy cards (rounding down).
If there are any allied Followers and any cards with a SIZE of 3 in your Hand, the first enemy card with a SIZE of 3 is sent to the Grave.
If there are allied Followers with "Dress Up" in the name, the first card in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE =5/ATK +3/STA +3.

If there are any allied Followers and there are any enemy Spells, all enemy Spells are sent to the grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards. If there are no enemy Spells, all allied Spells are sent to the Grave. If that happens, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards.
If you have a Darklore Character, enemy cards with a SIZE of 3-5, as well as allied non-Darklore Followers, are sent to the owners' Graves.
If there are cards in your Hand and Field with "Lucca", "Milka", and "Serie" in the names, the first allied Follower gets ATK +4/STA +4.
A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by its SIZE and gets DEF -1.
If there are at least two allied Followers with the same name, the first set of matching Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
If there are at least two allied Followers with "Tennis" in the name, the enemy Character gets LIFE -3.

If there are any allied Followers, allied Followers that belong to the first allied Follower's faction are sent to the Grave. If this happens, enemy Followers that belong to the first enemy Follower's faction, except for the first enemy Follower, are sent to the Grave. This card is removed from the game.
The first allied Follower with a skill and the first enemy Follower with a skill get their SIZE, ATK, DEF, STA, and skills swapped.

All enemy cards are deactivated and get STA decreased by half of the number of deactivated cards (rounding down). If your Character has "Sita" in the name, all enemy Followers get DEF decreased by the number of deactivated cards.
All Followers in your Hand get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and Grave with the same name as this card.
All cards in your Hand and Grave with the name "Home Study" are removed from the game. Two random enemy Followers get STA decreased by twice the number of removed cards.
A random allied Academy Follower gets DEF increased by the number of enemy Followers with skills (by a maximum of 3).
The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name is deactivated. The first allied Follower with "Lady" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the deactivated Follower's SIZE.
The first allied Follower is deactivated. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE +3.

The first allied Follower is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with the highest SIZE that does not belong to the sent Follower's faction is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

If you have an Academy Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field is deactivated and gets STA decreased by the difference between 8 and this card's SIZE. If this card has a SIZE of less than 3, it gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card has a SIZE of at least 3, it is removed from the game.
If there are at least two Crux Followers in your Field, the first Follower in your Field gets STA +6.
All cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the difference between the number of sent allied cards and the number of sent enemy cards.
Allied Followers with a SIZE equal to the number of allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
A random allied Follower gets ATK increased by the amount that the enemy Character's LIFE exceeds your Character's LIFE (by a maximum of 9).
The first two allied Followers without skills get ATK +3/STA +3.

If there are any allied Followers, two random enemy Followers get DEF decreased by 4 minus this card's SIZE. Next, if this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. If it has a SIZE of at least 2, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.

If you have a Crux Character and there are Followers in your Field, one of the following effects is applied depending on the Turn Number:  ● Odd: Cards in the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards.  ● Even: Cards in the enemy Field with a SIZE and Slot number that are not both odd or both even are sent to the Grave. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of sent cards.
If there are any allied Followers, the first enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the ones digit of the difference between the number of cards in your Deck and the enemy Deck.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by half of the ones digit of the Turn Number (rounding down).
The first allied Follower is sent to the Grave. An enemy card with a Slot number equal to the sent card's SIZE is sent to the Grave.
Two random allied Followers get STA +3. If this happens, cards are sent from the enemy Deck to the enemy Hand until the enemy Hand is full.
All allied Followers get one of the following effects applied depending on the type of the first card in the enemy Hand:  ● Spell: DEF -1/STA +5  ● Follower: ATK +3/DEF -1

The first Follower in the enemy Field with a combined ATK/STA of at least 22 (with an original SIZE of 5 or less) or a combined ATK/STA of at least 32 (with an original SIZE of at least 6) gets ATK/STA changed to equal your Field SIZE. If you have a Darklore Character, the Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal half of your Field SIZE (rounding down) instead.
All enemy Followers with the highest combined ATK/STA get their ATK/STA halved (rounding up). If your Character has "Iri" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK -2/DEF -2/STA -2.
The first allied Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE =1 and gets ATK/STA increased by its SIZE reduction.
If there are allied Followers that belong to your Character's faction and allied Followers that do not belong to your Character's faction, two random allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
If there is at least one card in your Hand and the enemy Hand, then the first cards in each Hand are swapped.
A random allied Follower gets ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of factions in your Hand.
If there are Followers in both Fields, a random allied Follower and a random enemy Follower are sent to the Grave.
A random allied Vita Follower gets ATK increased by 1 plus the number of cards in your Hand and gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand minus 1.
If there are any allied Followers, then all allied and enemy Followers get DEF =0 and get STA decreased by the total change in DEF.
All Spells in the enemy Field are removed from the game. Two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of sent Spells.

Allied Academy Followers that have a SIZE of 2 or less get ATK =1/STA =1. The first Academy Follower in your Hand gets ATK increased by half of the total ATK reduction (rounding up) and STA increased by half of the total STA reduction (rounding up).
All Spells in your Hand get SIZE -1.
The last Academy card in your Hand is sent to the Grave. If this happens, a random enemy Follower gets ATK -4/STA -4.
The last card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a copy of the first card in the enemy Hand is created in the first empty Slot in your Hand.

The first card in your Deck is sent to the Grave and the second card in your Deck is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
Two random allied Academy Followers get their ATK increased by the number of cards in your Hand and get their STA increased by 1 plus the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
Two random enemy Followers get ATK -4/STA -4. If this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE =1 and is deactivated.
An allied Follower with the highest SIZE gets SIZE decreased by the difference between its SIZE and the SIZE of the first card in your Hand.
If your Hand contains three or fewer cards, Followers are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are four cards in your Hand.
If there are at least three cards in your Field with the same SIZE, Followers in your Field with that SIZE get ATK +3/STA +3.
The first allied Crux Follower with the highest STA gets STA halved (rounding up) and gets DEF increased by half of the STA reduction (rounding up).

The number of cards in your Hand and the number of empty Slots in your Hand are compared. Two random allied Crux Followers get their ATK increased by the higher number and get their STA increased by the lower number -1 (by a minimum of 1).
Two random allied Followers get SIZE -1/ATK +1/DEF +1/STA +1.
All allied Followers get STA +5 and all enemy Followers get ATK -2. If you have a Crux Character, all allied Followers get an additional ATK +1.
Enemy Followers with the same SIZE as the first enemy card get ATK/STA decreased by the number of enemy cards with the same SIZE as the first enemy card.
A random allied Follower is sent to the Grave. If this happens, the enemy Character gets LIFE -1 and the enemy player gets Shuffles -1.
The first allied Follower gets ATK/STA changed to equal half of its total ATK/STA (rounding up).
All enemy Followers get STA decreased by three times the number of cards in your Grave named "Mischief".
The first two Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are removed from the game. Three random Followers in your Grave with "GS" in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck.
If this card has a SIZE of at least 6, it gets SIZE =5. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by this card's SIZE. This card gets SIZE -1 and is sent to the enemy Field and deactivated.
If you have a Darklore Character and there are any allied Darklore Followers, all enemy Followers get SIZE =1/ATK =6/DEF =0/STA =6. All allied Followers get SIZE =1/ATK =6/STA =6.
All allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +3.
The first card in the enemy Hand that does not belong to the enemy Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
The first allied Vita Follower with the highest DEF gets STA increased by twice its DEF. The first Vita card in your Hand is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
Two random allied Vita Followers get the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK, and then this skill is removed."

The second allied Follower gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the first allied Follower's SIZE. If this happens, and if you have a Vita Character, the first allied Follower is sent to the bottom of your Deck. If you do not have a Vita Character, the first allied Follower is sent to the Grave.

The following effect occurs for each Follower in your Field: "The first Followers in both Fields with Slot numbers that are odd (if the Turn Number is odd) or even (if the Turn Number is even) are sent to the bottom of their owners' Decks."
The first Academy card in your Hand with "Maid' in the name is removed from the game. A random allied Academy Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the removed card's SIZE.

If you have an Academy Character, the first allied Academy Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of allied Academy cards and gets SIZE decreased by the number of allied cards with "Lady" in the name.

The first enemy card with a SIZE equal to this card's Slot number plus this card's SIZE is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card is removed from the game and replaced with a new deactivated copy of this card.

The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA doubled. That card gets the following skill: " At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal their original values, and then this skill is removed."
Two random enemy Followers get ATK -1/STA -3.
Allied Crux Followers with skills have their skills removed. Those Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of removed skills.
Spells in the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to that of the first Crux Follower in your Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the total SIZE of other allied Followers.
Two random allied Followers get ATK +4/STA +4. If this card has a SIZE of 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE =1 and is deactivated.
The enemy Follower that has a Slot number equal to this card's Slot number gets DEF =0/STA -2.
The first allied Follower that does not belong to the first allied Follower's faction is deactivated and gets STA +6.
A random Darklore Follower in your Field gets DEF +1/STA +4.

If there are no allied Followers, a new copy of the first enemy Follower with the highest total ATK/DEF/STA is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal those of the original Follower. The new Follower gets this skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave."
The first allied Follower that belongs to your Character's faction gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to equal the highest ATK/DEF/STA values in both Fields.
All cards in your Hand get SIZE -1. All cards in the enemy Field get SIZE +1. All other cards in both Fields and Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks. The enemy player gets Shuffle -1.

Your character gets LIFE +1 and you get Shuffle +1. A random allied Follower gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there are at least 5 cards in your Grave, a random card in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck.
Two random Followers in your Field get DEF +1. If this happens, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2.
랜덤한 자신 필드 추종자 1의 공격력+1. 해당 추종자의 공격력과 랜덤한 상대 필드 추종자1의 체력을 교환한다.
자신필드 추종자 전체 방어력 -3. 감소치의 절반(올림) +1만큼 자신 필드 사이즈가 가장 큰 첫번째 공립소속 추종자의 방어력 증가.
자신필드 첫번째 사립소속 추종자1의 공/방/체 중 원래 능력치보다 감소한 수치는 원래 수치가 된다.
랜덤한 자신핸드추종자 1의 사이즈의 절반(올림)만큼 자신의 라이프 감소. 그랬을 경우 감소치만큼 자신필드추종자 전체 공/체 증가
자신캐릭터와 같은 소속인 랜덤한 상대필드 추종자 1을 자신 필드 빈 첫번째 슬롯으로 행동종료 상태로 옮긴다.
랜덤한 자신필드 추종자 3의 공/체는 4와 해당 추종자 사이즈의 차이값 만큼 증가
The first Follower in your Field with the lowest SIZE gets SIZE +2/ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2.
If there are any Followers in your Field, all non-Crux Followers in both Fields get STA -3.
상대무덤 맨 위의 카드를 게임에서 제거한다. 그랬을 경우 해당 카드가 3사이즈 이하일 경우 자신 필드 첫번째 빈 공간에 턴 개시시 이 카드는 무덤으로 간다" 특수능력이 부여된 좀비 카드 생성. 4사이즈 이상일 경우 자신 필드 첫번째 빈 공간에 "데빌레이디" 카드 생성.
자신무덤 맨 위 카드를 순서대로 3장까지 게임에서 제거한다. 제거된 카드 중 다크로어 소속 추종자 수만큼 랜덤한 자신 필드 추종자 2의 공/체 증가
자신무덤의 다크로어 소속 추종자 모두 게임에서 제거한다. 그랬을경우 제거한 수 만큼 랜덤한 상대 필드 추종자 1의 체력 감소.
전체필드카드 수의 합 까지 자신과 상대핸드 카드를 덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다. 그랬을경우 옮긴 카드 수의 합 만큼 랜덤한 자신필드 추종자 1의 체력 증가.
자신핸드/필드 무소속 카드 수-1 만큼 자신캐릭터의 라이프 증가. 자신필드 추종자 전체 체력증가.
랜덤한 자신필드 추종자 1은 자신핸드카드 전체 소속에 따라 이하의 효과를 1회씩 얻는다. 공립 : 공격력 +2, 사립 : 체력 +2, 크룩스 : 공/체 +1, 다크로어 : 사이즈 -1, 무소속 : 공/체 +2
Two random allied Vita Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Sita" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.
The first two cards in your Deck with "Sita" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, those cards get SIZE -2.

A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the ATK of the first Follower in your Hand. A new copy of the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.
Two random allied Academy Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Cinia" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.

The first two cards in your Deck with "Cinia" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand. If this happens, the first enemy Follower with a STA equal to or less than the total SIZE of the sent cards is sent to the Grave.

If there are any allied Followers and there are any enemy Followers with skills, a new copy of the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is created in the first empty Slot in your Field, and then a random enemy Follower has its first skill removed and it gets one of the following skills randomly:  ● Before this card attacks, it gets ATK -1.  ● Before this card is attacked, it gets STA -3.
Two random allied Crux Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Luthica" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.

Two random allied Followers get DEF increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up). The first two cards in your Deck with "Luthica" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.

A random allied Follower gets one of the following skills (If this happens, a new copy of the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.):  ● Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.  ● Before this card is attacked, it gets STA +3.  ● At the start of the turn, this card gets DEF +2.
Two random allied Darklore Followers get ATK +2/STA +2. Two random allied Followers with "Iri" in the name get ATK +1/STA +1.

If there are any allied Followers, a random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by 1 plus the number of empty Slots in your Hand. The first two cards in your Deck with "Iri" in the name are sent to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.

The first card in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE halved (rounding down). If this happens, a new copy of the first Spell in the enemy Hand without "Halloween" in the name is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.
Up to two random allied Followers with "Council" in the name are deactivated. The first enemy Follower with the highest STA gets STA decreased by the total ATK of the deactivated Followers.

The first allied Follower with "Maid" in the name and the lowest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE decreased by the Follower's SIZE, and Academy Followers in your Hand and Field get ATK +2/STA +2.
Allied Followers with "Seeker" in the name get the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding up), and then this skill is removed."
All enemy Followers get ATK decreased by 1 plus the number of allied Followers with "Witch" in the name. Allied Followers with "Witch" in the name get ATK increased by the same amount.
All allied Followers get ATK +4/STA +4.
For each empty Slot in the enemy Hand, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand.
All enemy Followers get STA -4.
All enemy Followers get DEF -5.
All cards in both Fields get SIZE = 1.
All enemy cards with "Sion" or "Rion" in the name are destroyed.
All enemy Followers get SIZE = 1-10. (Randomly)
All enemy Followers get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1."
All enemy Followers have their skills removed.
If there are no empty Slots in the enemy Field, all cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.

If there are Followers in your Field with "Council" in the name and there are any Followers in the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the SIZE of the the first card in your Hand, the first card in your Hand and the first enemy Follower with that card's SIZE are sent to the owners' Graves.
All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by one plus half of the Turn Number (rounding down, by a maximum of 5). You get Shuffles +1 and the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK +1/STA +1. Two random Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name get ATK +2/STA +2.

If there are any Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, all Followers in your Field with "Lady" in the name get STA increased by the sent card's SIZE.

All Spells in the enemy Field are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. A number of Spells named "Pleased to Meet You" equal to 1 plus the number of sent Spells are created in the first empty Slots in the enemy Field and deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
Two random Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of skills they have.
The first Follower in your Field with the highest STA gets ATK and STA swapped, and then gets STA +2.

Followers adjacent to this card get STA +3. If they have "Seeker" in the name, they get an additional ATK +2. If the Turn Number is even, a random Spell in the enemy Field is deactivated. This card is removed from the game and replaced with a new deactivated copy of itself.
If there are any Followers in your Field, the following effect is applied three times: "A random Follower in either Field gets ATK -1/STA -3."
The first Follower in your Field and a Follower in Slot 3 in the enemy Field get DEF/STA swapped with each other. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.

A random Follower in the enemy Field gets one of the following effects applied depending on this card's Slot number, a random Spell in the enemy Field is deactivated (if the Turn Number is odd), and then this card is removed from the game and replaced with a new deactivated copy of itself:  ● 1: STA -2  ● 2: ATK -1/STA -1  ● 3: ATK -1/STA -2  ● 4: ATK -2/STA -2  ● 5: ATK -2/STA -3
A random Follower in the enemy Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field.
The Turn Number is increased by 2. All enemy Followers get ATK -2/STA -2.
The following effect is applied five times: "A random enemy Follower gets STA -5."
All enemy Followers get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets STA = 1."
All cards in your Hand with "Lib." in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. If this happens, an equal number of random cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.
Followers in your Field with an ATK equal to their STA get ATK +4/STA +4.

The first Follower in your Grave that belongs to your Character's faction is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, gets ATK +2/STA +2, and is deactivated. That Follower's skills are removed until the start of the next turn.

Academy Followers in your Field that do not have skills that state "Before this card is attacked" get DEF +1/STA +3. The first card in your Deck with "Lady" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
