Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half of the total SIZE of Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name (rounding down).

If there are any Followers in your Field, and if any of the following conditions are met, four random cards in either Field are sent to the Grave and this card is removed from the game:  ● The Turn Number is a multiple of 4.  ● The total number of Followers in both Fields is 4.  ● The total number of empty Slots in both Hands is 4.

If there are Followers in your Field with "Seeker" in the name and this card has a SIZE of 1, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -4, the enemy player gets Shuffles -1, and a random card in the enemy Hand is sent to the Grave. If this card does not have a SIZE of 1, it gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.
Up to two random Followers in the enemy Hand are swapped with up to two random Followers in the enemy Field.

If you have a Crux Character, the first ten cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the number of removed cards divided by 1 plus the number of Followers in the enemy Field (rounding down).
If there are at least three Followers in the enemy Field with the same SIZE, the first of those Followers is destroyed.
If there are at least three Followers in your Field, the first Follower in the enemy Field with the highest ATK gets ATK changed to equal its original value.
Two cards named "GS Scout" and "Aletheian Bina" are created in your Grave, the enemy Grave, and the bottom of your Deck.
All Followers in your Field get STA -5.
Your Character gets LIFE -5-+5.
All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA halved (rounding up.)
All Followers in your Field get DEF doubled. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get all skills removed.
All Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
All cards in your Hand and Field are sent to the top of your Deck. All cards in the enemy Field are deactivated.
All cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game.
Spells named "Good Job" are created in all empty Slots in both Fields.
All Followers in the enemy Field get SIZE decreased by the number of empty Slots in the enemy Field and get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by their SIZE reduction.
상대핸드 빈슬롯 수 만큼의 상대덱 맨 위의 스펠카드를 차례대로 상대핸드 빈 슬롯으로 옮긴다.
상대핸드의 "호문클루스 에스코트"카드 전체 상대필드 빈 첫번째 슬롯부터 차례대로 배치한다. 그랬을경우 이 효과로 이동한 카드 수 만큼 상대캐릭터의 라이프 감소.
The Follower in your Field with the lowest DEF gets DEF changed to equal the highest DEF in the enemy Field.
All enemy Followers get STA decreased by the average SIZE of cards in your Field (rounding down).
The first five Vita Followers in your Deck get ATK/STA increased by 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1, respectively. You get Shuffles +1
If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF -4.
For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, the first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
If you have an Academy Character and your Field SIZE is at least 3, all cards in both Fields are randomly rearranged. The number of movements will not exceed the total number of cards in both Fields.
The first card in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up).
Two random Followers in your Field get SIZE decreased by the number of Spells in your Field and get STA increased by the SIZE reduction.
If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in both Fields are sent to the owners' Graves. If this happens, the first Spell in your Hand is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.

The first Follower in your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the next Follower in your Field gets ATK +4 and gets STA increased by the sent Follower's DEF. If the sent Follower has "Aletheian" in the name, it gets an additional SIZE -1.

The first Follower in your Field with "GS" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens, that Follower gets ATK=0, gets STA increased by the ATK reduction, and gets the following skills: "Before this card is attacked, all Followers in your Field get DEF -1." "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave".

If you have a Darklore Character, the second Follower in your Field gets its skills copied to the first Follower in your Field. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of copied skills.
All enemy cards are deactivated. All enemy Spells get Size +1. All enemy Followers have their skills removed. The enemy player gets Shuffles -1.
All allied Followers get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, if its DEF is less than 0, it gets DEF multiplied by -1."

All Followers in your Hand get stats changed to equal the stats of the first card in your Field with "Conundrum" in the name. All Followers in the enemy Hand get stats changed to equal the first card in the enemy Field with "Conundrum" in the name.
Hint: A random powerful Spell will appear.
Hint: Thank you.
Hint: Endless decay.
Cards in Slots 1 and 5 in the enemy Field are swapped. Cards in Slots 2 and 4 in the enemy Field are swapped. Followers in Slots 1 and 2 in the enemy Field get STA -2.
The first card in the enemy Field with a SIZE equal to the difference between 10 and your Field SIZE gets ATK -2/STA -2 and is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1. If there are active cards in the enemy Field that are not named "Enrollment", this card is replaced with a new copy of itself.
Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1. If their STA is even, they get an additional ATK -2/STA -2.

For each Follower in your Field with "Lady" in the name, a card on top of the enemy Deck is sent to the enemy Hand. If at least three cards are sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of empty Slots in your Hand. All cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks.
If you have a Crux Character and this card's SIZE is 1, this card gets SIZE =2 and is sent to the enemy Field. If this card's SIZE is 2, it gets SIZE =1 and is sent to the enemy Field.
The first Follower in your Hand is sent to the Grave. The Follower in your Field with the lowest STA gets STA changed equal to the sent Follower's STA.
Two random Crux Followers in your Field get STA increased by the ATK of the first Follower in the enemy Field.
All cards in both Fields except for this card and the first Follower in your Field get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the total SIZE reduction.
If the total SIZE of all Followers in your Field is greater than the total SIZE of all Followers in the enemy Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK/DEF/SIZE halved (rounding up).

If there are any Spells in the enemy Field, the first Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK +4/STA +4. If the sent Follower does not belong to your Character's faction, it gets an additional SIZE -1.

All cards in your Deck with a SIZE of 10 are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For each card sent, a random card in the enemy Field is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and all Followers in your Field get STA +1. All Followers in your Field are deactivated.
Hint: Whatever you offer might not be enough.
Hint: You need to go on a diet, but it might be too late.
Hint: Are you a knight?

The first Spell in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave. The first Spell in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. If the sent card's SIZE is odd, it is sent to the Grave.

The first Follower in your Field and a random Follower in the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the SIZE of the first Follower in your Field get ATK/STA changed to half of the total ATK/STA of the two Followers (rounding down).

If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in both Fields with a SIZE less than this card's SIZE are sent to the owners' Graves. If this card's SIZE is at least 6, this card is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
All allied and enemy cards get SIZES randomly redistributed.
Two random allied Followers get STA increased by the number of Spells in the top 5 cards of your Deck and ATK increased by the number of Followers in the top 5 cards of your Deck.

If you have an Academy Character and there are at least as many Spells in the enemy Field as Followers, a random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by twice the sent Follower's SIZE (by a maximum of 10).

If there are any Followers in your Field, the following effect is applied a number of times equal to the difference between the number of cards in your Field and the enemy Field: A random enemy Follower gets SIZE +1/ATK -1.

The Follower in your Field with the lowest STA is destroyed. If your Character's LIFE is lower than the enemy Character's LIFE, a number of random Followers in the enemy Field equal to half of the destroyed Follower's SIZE (rounding down) are sent to the Grave.
All cards in the enemy Field with SIZES that are odd and all non-Crux cards in your Field are sent to the owners' Graves.
The first Follower in your Field gets its original skills restored and gets ATK +1/STA +1.
Two random Darklore Followers in your Field get ATK increased by the total DEF of all Followers in the enemy Field and get STA decreased by half of the ATK increase (rounding up) minus 1.

If you have a Darklore Character, you get Shuffles +5. If this happens, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of enemy Shuffles. The enemy player gets Shuffles -1. This card is removed from the game.
Two random allied Followers get ATK +3/STA +3.
Hint: Odd? Even!

All Followers in your Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK +1/STA +1. Your Character gets LIFE +1. You get Shuffles +1. All Followers in the enemy Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK -1/STA -1. This card is removed from the game.
All cards in your Grave with the same name as the first card in your Field are sent to the bottom of your Deck. This card is removed from the game.
All Followers in your Field get SIZE =4 and get ATK/DEF/STA increased by their SIZE increase.
All cards in the enemy Field except for the first and last cards are sent to the Grave.
The first card in the enemy Field with a SIZE of at least 6 is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
The first card in the enemy Field with a total SIZE/DEF of 5 is destroyed. Your Character gets LIFE decreased by half the destroyed card's DEF (rounding up).

The first 10 cards in your Deck and the enemy Deck are sent to the owners' Graves. If this happens, 10 random cards in your Grave that do not have this card's name are sent to the bottom of your Deck and 10 random cards in the enemy Grave are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is removed from the game.

If this card's SIZE is at least 3, it gets SIZE=3. Your Character gets LIFE increased by 1 plus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE -1 and is deactivated.

If all other cards in your Hand and Field belong to your Character's faction, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF decreased by half the total number of cards in your Hand and Field (rounding down).
If there are any Spells in the enemy Hand, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4. Otherwise, all Followers in your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
Followers in your Field with "GS", "Aletheian", or "Apostle" in the name get ATK +3.

All Darklore Followers in your Field are deactivated. A random card in the enemy Field with a SIZE less than or equal to the number of deactivated Followers is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck (if it is a Follower) or the Grave (if it is a Spell).
The last Follower in your Deck is sent to the Grave. A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4/SIZE -1.
The first card in your Hand is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in the enemy Field is destroyed.
Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA decreased to their original values.
All enemy Followers get ATK/DEF/STA decreased by twice the amount that their ATK/DEF/STA exceed their original values.
상대핸드 첫번째 추종자를 “게임 스타터”로 바꾼다.
자신핸드의 카드를 모두 덱 맨 밑으로 보낸 뒤, 덱 맨 위의 추종자와 스펠을 각각 2장씩 핸드로 가져온다.
카드 이름에 “학생회” “도서부”가 들어가지 않은 랜덤한 자신필드 공립소속추종자 2는 자신의 공격순서에 따라 이하의 효과를 얻는다. 선공 : 공/방/체 +3/+1/+1. 후공 : 공/방/체 +1/+1/+3
사이즈가 1이 아니고, 이 카드를 제외한 자신캐릭터와 소속이 같은 자신필드 1,2,3번째 카드와 자신핸드 맨 앞 1,2,3번째 카드, 자신덱 맨 위의 1,2,3번째 카드들의 사이즈 -1
랜덤한 상대필드 추종자 2의 공/체 -1/-2. 자신필드에 사이즈 6이상의 카드가 있을경우 이 수치는 2배가 된다.
카드 이름에 “메이드” “레이디”가 들어가지 않은 랜덤한 자신필드 사립소속추종자 2는 자신의 공격순서에 따라 이하의 효과를 얻는다. 선공 : 공/방/체 +3/+1/+1. 후공 : 공/방/체 +1/+1/+3
자신캐릭터와 소속이 같은 자신필드 추종자 전체 모든 특수능력은 원래의 특수능력이 된 후 공/방/체 수치 중 감소된 수치는 원래의 수치가 된다.
방어력이 1이상인 랜덤한 자신필드 크룩스소속 추종자 2의 방어력은 2배만큼 감소. 그랬을 경우 감소치의 2배만큼 해당 추종자의 공격력 증가.
카드 이름에 “기사단” “신성연구회”가 들어가지 않은 랜덤한 자신필드 크룩스소속 추종자 2는 자신의 공격순서에 따라 이하의 효과를 얻는다. 선공 : 공/방/체 +3/+1/+1. 후공 : 공/방/체 +1/+1/+3
자신필드 크룩스소속 추종자 수만큼의 상대필드 추종자는 자신필드 크룩스소속 추종자 수로 공/방/체를 나눈다.(내림)
자신 셔플 수 -1.(0이하가 되지 않는다.) 그랬을 경우 자신 핸드/필드의 모든 추종자는 공/체 +2.
카드 이름에 “마녀” “GS”가 들어가지 않은 랜덤한 자신필드 다크로어소속 추종자 2는 자신의 공격순서에 따라 이하의 효과를 얻는다. 선공 : 공/방/체 +3/+1/+1. 후공 : 공/방/체 +1/+1/+3
상대필드 빈 첫번째 슬롯에 “수고하셨습니다” 1장을 행동종료 상태로 배치하고 다음 빈 슬롯에 "수고하셨습니다" 1장을 배치한다. 상대 덱 맨 위와 아래에 “수고하셨습니다” 2장을 각각 생성한다.
자신필드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 공/체 +2
상대핸드 첫번째 추종자의 특수능력은 모두 사라진다. 해당 추종자와 랜덤한 상대필드 추종자 1의 특수능력을 교체한다.
상대 필드/핸드의 전체 스펠은 해당 카드 소속에 따라 다음과 같은 스펠로 바뀐다. 공립 : 신입 부원 환영, 사립 : 신입 메이드 교육, 크룩스 : 접근조우, 다크로어 : 블러드 백, 무소속 : 행복한 순간
상대 캐릭터의 셔플수 -1 라이프 -1. 랜덤한 상대필드 추종자 1의 공/체 -1. 자신 무덤의 카드 수가 5 이상이면 랜덤한 자신무덤카드 1을 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다.
A random Follower in your Field is moved to this card's Slot and gets ATK/STA increased by its new Slot number.
Two random Vita Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied to Followers in the enemy Field.
Two random Followers in your Field get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets ATK/DEF increased to their original values."
If you have a Vita Character, all Followers in the enemy Hand, Field, and Deck get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -1. A random Follower in the enemy Field is deactivated. This card is removed from the game.
The following effect is applied twice: "A random card in the enemy Field is deactivated."
Two random Academy Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied to Followers in the enemy Field.
The first two cards in the enemy Deck are copied to the first two empty Slots in your Hand.

If you have an Academy Character, all Spells in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. All Spells in the enemy Field and a random Follower in the enemy Field are deactivated. All Spells in the enemy Hand and Deck get SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by 2 plus the number of Spells in the enemy Field.
Two random Crux Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied to Followers in the enemy Field.

If you have a Crux Character and the Turn Number is even, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK +5/STA +5. If the Turn Number is a multiple of 3, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets ATK -5/STA -5.

If you have a Crux Character, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -9, all Followers in the enemy Hand get STA -3, and all Followers in the enemy Deck get STA -1. This card is removed from the game.

All cards in your Hand and Deck with the same name as the first Follower in your Field are sent to the Grave. The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent Followers and DEF increased by half (rounding up) the number of sent Followers.
Two random Darklore Followers in your Field get ATK +2/STA +2. If the enemy Character is an NPC, an additional effect is applied to Followers in the enemy Field.
All Followers in the enemy Field with at least 2 DEF get DEF decreased by twice their own DEF.

If you have a Darklore Character, all cards in the enemy Grave are sent to your Grave. The first Follower in your Hand and the first Follower in your Deck get STA increased by the tens digit of the number of cards in your Grave and ATK increased by the ones digit of the number of cards in your Grave. This card is removed from the game.

If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, it is removed from the game. If your character's LIFE is less than or equal to the enemy character's LIFE, this card gets SIZE -1, gets swapped with a random enemy Follower, and gets deactivated.

A card named "Cook Club Critic" is created in this card's Slot, gets SIZE changed to equal this card's Slot number, and gets ATK/STA changed to equal twice this card's Slot number. This card is removed from the game.

The first two cards in your Hand get SIZE changed to equal this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 2 or less, this card is sent to the Grave. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE =1-5 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand.
If you have a Vita Character, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2 and get the following skill: "At the start of the turn, this card is sent to the Grave."

One of following effects is applied depending on who wins the coin flip in the Battle Phase:  ● You win: The first card in the enemy Hand is removed from the game.  ● Opponent wins: The first 5 cards in your Grave are removed from the game.
Two random Followers in your Field get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets STA increased to its original value. This skill is removed."

If you have an Academy Character, the 10th card in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. One of the following effects is applied depending on the sent card's type:  ● Follower: Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -4/STA -4.  ● Spell: All Spells in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.
The first Follower in your Field and the last Follower in the enemy Field get SIZE, ATK, DEF, and STA swapped.
If there are any Followers in your Field with "Blue Cross" in the name, a random Follower in your Field and a random Follower in the enemy Field get STA =1.

If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Hand, a random Follower in the enemy Field, and a random Follower in the enemy Deck that do not belong to the enemy Character's faction gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, it is sent to the first empty slot of the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed."

All Followers in your Field with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name get STA increased by the total number of cards in your Hand and Field with "Crescent", "Scardel", or "Flina" in the name and get ATK increased by half of the STA increase (rounding up).

If there are Followers in both your Field and your Grave, two random Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by the difference between the number of Followers in your Grave and the number of Followers in the enemy Grave (by a maximum of 8).

If you have a Darklore Character, Followers in the enemy Field that have skills that state "Before this card attacks" or "At the start of the turn" get those skills replaced with the following skill: "Before this card attacks, this card gets ATK -1." All Followers in your Hand and Field get the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1."

All Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by 1 plus the number of Shuffles you have. You get Shuffles +2. If this card's SIZE is at least 3, it is removed from the game. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the top of your Deck.
Two random allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +2.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3. Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/STA -1.

All Followers in your Hand and Field with "Lib." in the name are sent to the bottom of your Deck. For every two sent cards, a Follower with "Lib." in the name is sent from the top of your Deck to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets ATK/STA increased by half of the number of cards sent to the bottom of your Deck (rounding down).
The second Follower in the enemy Field gets STA changed to equal to the Slot number of the last card in the enemy Field and gets ATK increased by half of the STA decrease (rounding down).
A random allied Follower gets ATK or STA (25%:75% chance) increased by the ones digit of the Turn Number.

If you have an Academy Character, all Followers in the enemy Field with the highest SIZE get ATK/STA decreased by the difference between the SIZE of the Follower in your Field with the lowest SIZE and that of the Follower in the enemy Field with the highest SIZE.
The first other card in your Field is destroyed. If this happens, the first card in the enemy Field is destroyed.

All Followers in both Fields get SIZE decreased by the number of cards in their owners' Fields with "Knight" and STA decreased by the number of cards in their owners' Fields without "Knight" in the name.
All Followers in your Hand and Field have all of their skills changed to the following skill: "Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1."

If you have a Crux Character, the first card in the enemy Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field. If this happens, all Spells in the enemy Field (if there are at least two Spells in the enemy Field) and/or all Followers in the enemy Field (if there are at least three Followers in the enemy Field) are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in your Grave with "Crescent", "Scardel", "Flina", or "Ritual of Unity" in the name (by a maximum of 9).

A random card in the enemy Field is deactivated. If the deactivated card was a Spell, a random Follower in your Field gets ATK increased by the deactivated card's SIZE. If it was a Follower, a random Follower in your Field gets STA increased by the deactivated card's SIZE.
If this card has a SIZE of at least 5, it is sent to the Grave. The first card in the enemy Hand is replaced with a new copy of this card and gets SIZE +1. This card is removed from the game.
The first Follower in your Field gets DEF =1. If there was no change in DEF, two random Followers in the enemy Field get DEF -1/STA -3.
All Followers in your Field with "Lib." in the name get SIZE -1. The first Follower in your Hand with "Lib." in the name gets SIZE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.

The first five Spells in the enemy Deck are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. All cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If you have a Vita Character, the opponent gets Shuffles -1.
Up to three cards in the enemy Grave that do not belong to the enemy Character's faction are removed from the game. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of removed cards.

Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA increased by 3 minus this card's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 1, it is removed from the game. This card gets SIZE -2, is sent to the enemy Field, and is deactivated.

The following effects are applied depending on the sum of the original SIZEs of other cards in your Field (If you have an Academy Character, this card's SIZE is included):  ● 5 or less: A random enemy Spell is sent to the Grave.  ● 6~9: Two random enemy Followers get ATK -3/STA -3.  ● 10 or more: All previous effects are applied, then a random enemy card is sent to the Grave.
Two random Crux Followers in your Field get DEF=0. Those Followers get ATK increased by the average of their SIZES (rounding up).

If you have a Crux Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets SIZE +1. If that Follower's SIZE is at least 4, it gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, this card gets STA -1."

A random Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2 and gets the following skill: "Before this card attacks, the defender's first skill is sent to this card. If this happens, this skill is removed." If you have a Crux Character, this skill is applied a second time.

Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1-3 (randomly). This card gets SIZE +1 and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Hand. If this card's SIZE is at least 2, it is sent to the Grave instead.

The first Follower in your Field with the lowest STA is removed from the game. If this happens, a random Follower in your Grave is removed from the game and a new copy of it is created in the first empty Slot in your Field.

If you have a Darklore Character, Followers in your Hand and Field with 10 or less ATK get STA +4, and Followers in your Hand and Field with 10 or less STA get ATK +3. All Followers in your Hand and Field get their ATK and STA swapped.

Your Character gets LIFE +4. The opponent gets Shuffles -1. The following effects are applied depending on your Character's LIFE.  ● 31 or more: 2 random cards in the enemy Hand are sent to the Grave.  ● 15-25: A random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to the Grave.  ● 5-8: Two random cards in the enemy Field are sent to the Grave.

A random enemy Follower is deactivated and gets the following skills: “At the start of turn, this card is sent to the Grave.” “Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding down), and then this skill is removed.”
The first allied Follower with "Council" in the name gets ATK +2, then the first Follower in the enemy Field with an ATK lower than that Follower's ATK is deactivated.
Two random Followers in your Field get STA +3 or STA +5 (50% chance).

The first Follower in your Field that belongs to your Character's faction is removed from the game. The first card in your Deck with the highest SIZE is sent to the removed Follower's Slot. That card gets SIZE changed to equal the removed Follower's SIZE.
If you have an Academy Character, your Character gets LIFE +1. If there are 15 or fewer cards in your Deck, , your Character gets an additional LIFE +3.
The following effect is applied four times to a random Follower in the enemy Field: ATK -1, DEF -1, or STA -1.

A random card in the enemy Field is sent to the bottom of the enemy Grave, and then this card gets SIZE=1, gets sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and is deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 1, the last card in your Grave is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then this card is removed from the game.

Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until there are at least four cards in your Hand. All Followers in your Field get STA increased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Blue Cross" in the name.
A random Spell in the enemy Field that is not named "Experience" is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.

The first Follower in your Field with the highest SIZE gets SIZE/ATK/DEF/STA halved (rounding down). If this happens, a copy of that Follower is created in the first empty Slot in your Field with half of its previous SIZE (rounding up).

Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/STA decreased by the number of cards in the top three cards of your Grave that belong to your Character's faction. A random Follower in your Field gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards in the top three cards of your Grave with "GS" in the name.
All Followers on both players' Fields get their skills removed until the start of the next turn.
If you have a Darklore Character, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the difference between its ATK and DEF.
A random Follower in the enemy Field with a DEF equal to 10 - your Field SIZE is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck.
All Followers in your Field with "Cook Club" in the name get their SIZE and first skill changed to the SIZE and first skill of the second Follower in your Field with "Cook Club" in the name.

If you have a Vita Character, two of the following effects are randomly applied:  ● Your Character gets LIFE +3.  ● All Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.  ● The enemy Character gets LIFE -1.  ● All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -3/STA -3.  ● The first card in the enemy Field is removed from the game.
Followers in both Fields with an odd STA get STA -3. Followers in both Fields with an even STA get ATK +3.

If this card's SIZE is at least 3, two random Followers in your Field get ATK -2/STA -2 and the enemy Character gets LIFE +2. Otherwise, this card gets SIZE +1~2 and is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field and deactivated.

A random Follower in the enemy Field is changed into "Delinquent Witch Cadet". If you have an Academy Character, two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by the total number of Academy Followers in both Fields (by a maximum of 4).
If your Field contains a Follower with "Knight" in the name and a Follower with "Seeker" in the name, all Followers in your Field get ATK +4.
All Spells in your Hand are sent from your Hand to the empty Slots in your Field, starting from the first. Your Character gets LIFE increased by the number of sent cards.
If you have a Crux Character, all Spells in the enemy Hand and Field are sent to the top of the enemy Deck. All Followers in the enemy Hand and Field get DEF decreased by the number of sent cards.
The first Follower in your Deck that belongs to the faction of the first Follower in your Field is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and gets SIZE -1.

All Followers in your Field except the first are sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, a number of Followers in the enemy Field equal to 1 plus the number of sent Followers, are sent to the top of the enemy Deck, except for the first.
If you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in the enemy Field get ATK/DEF/STA changed to the ATK/DEF/STA of the first Follower in your Field.
The Follower in Slot 5 in your Field gets ATK +4/STA +4.
The first two Followers in your Deck are sent to the top of your Deck and get ATK/STA increased by half of the number of empty Slots in your Hand (rounding up).
If there are at least two cards with the same name in the enemy Field, they are sent to the Grave.
All Spells in the top 5 cards in the enemy Grave are removed from the game. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the number of removed cards.

A random Follower in the enemy Field is sent to a random Slot in the enemy Field. That Follower gets ATK/STA decreased by the difference between its old and new Slot numbers. If you have an Academy Character, this effect is applied a second time.
If there are any Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field with at least two skills is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1.
A random Crux Follower in your Field gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets STA decreased by half of its own ATK (rounding up). This skill is removed."
The first Follower in your Field with ATK 5 or less gets its ATK doubled.
Cards are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until you have at least four cards in your Hand. A random Follower in your Field gets DEF/STA increased by 1 plus the number of sent cards.
If there are any Followers in your Field, a random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF +1. If that Follower has at least 5 DEF, it is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.

If your Field contains a Follower and another Spell and the enemy Field contains a Spell, a random Spell in your Hand that is not named "Witness of Miracles" is copied to the first empty Slot in your Field.
If the top Follower in the enemy Grave and the first Follower in your Field have the same SIZE, the top Follower in the enemy Grave is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
자신필드 추종자 전체 공/체 +2. 사이즈 -1. 자신필드 추종자 수만큼 자신 덱 맨 밑 추종자들의 공/체 -2. 사이즈 +1.
자신필드 첫번째 추종자와 마지막 추종자의 위치를 교환한다. 해당추종자들의 슬롯번호 차이만큼 해당추종자는 사이즈감소.
자신 덱 위에서 5, 7번째 카드중 공립소속인 카드를 자신필드 빈 슬롯에 순서대로 복사한다. 자신 덱 위에서 9번째 카드가 공립소속일경우 자신핸드 빈 첫번째 슬롯에 복사한다.
상대핸드 랜덤한 추종자 1과 자신필드 첫번째 추종자의 사이즈를 교환한다. 그랬을경우 자신필드 첫번째 추종자는 사이즈가 변화한 수치만큼 공/체증가.
상대필드 방어력이 0이상인 랜덤한 추종자 1의 방어력 2배만큼 자신필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공격력증가.
자신캐릭터가 사립소속이고 자신필드에 추종자가 있을경우 자신필드 홀수 슬롯에 있는 카드는 전부 상대필드 빈 슬롯으로 이동한다. 상대필드 짝수 슬롯에 있는 카드는 전부 자신필드 빈 슬롯으로 이동한다.
자신필드 추종자가 2이상일경우 상대필드 행동가능한 사이즈가 가장 큰 첫번째 추종자를 행동종료상태로 한다. 해당추종자의 특수능력은 다음 턴 개시시 원래의 특수능력이 되는 능력이 된다.
자신필드 방어력이 가장 높은 첫번째 추종자는 방어력의 2배만큼 방어력감소. 감소된 수치만큼 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/체감소.(최대 5)
자신 셔플 수 +2. 자신캐릭터가 크룩스소속일경우 자신 셔플 수 절반(내림)만큼 자신 덱 추종자 전체 방어력 증가.(최대 2)
이 카드의 사이즈와 같은 자신 덱 추종자 전체 공/체 +1.
사이즈가 가장 큰 상대 덱 맨 위 추종자의 공/체 -3.
자신캐릭터가 다크로어소속이고 상대핸드 카드 빈 슬롯수가 1이하일경우 상대필드 랜덤한 카드 2를 자신필드 빈 슬롯으로 가져온다.
자신필드 짝수 슬롯에 있는 모든 추종자의 방어력 +2.
자신필드에 "무소속"과 "무소속 이외" 추종자가 각각 존재할경우 자신필드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 공/방/체 +1/+1/+3.
상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 2는 "공격전 이 카드는 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다."특수능력을 얻는다.
The first Follower in your Field gets the following skill: "Before this card attacks, all Followers in the enemy Field get STA -1. This card gets ATK increased by the total STA reduction."

The first Follower in your Field gets DEF increased by this card's SIZE and gets the following skill: "Before this card is attacked, it gets ATK/STA increased by the Turn Number, and then this skill is removed."
A random active Vita Follower in your Field is deactivated. If this happens, a random Spell in the enemy Field is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Hand.

Two random Followers in your Field get ATK/STA increased by half of the number of Followers in the bottom four cards of your Deck (rounding up). If the ATK/STA increase was 2, they get an additional STA +1.
All Followers in both Fields get DEF +1. All Followers in both Fields (except for Vita Followers in your Field) with at least 3 DEF are sent to the Grave.
Enemy Followers with a SIZE of at least 3 get SIZE -1. The enemy Character gets LIFE decreased by the total SIZE reduction.
The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA changed to their original values. The first Follower in your Hand gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the respective changes in each stat.

The first Academy Follower in your Deck is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, all cards in both Hands are sent to the bottom of the owners' Decks in reverse order. That Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of sent Followers and gets SIZE decreased by the number of sent Spells.
The first Spell in your Deck with the same SIZE as this card is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field.
A random Spell in the enemy Grave with the highest SIZE is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated.

Up to eight cards in both Graves are removed from the game. The following effects are applied depending on the number of removed cards:  ● 8 or less: All Followers in your Field get ATK +3/STA +3.  ● 9-15: All cards in your Hand and Field get SIZE -1.  ● 16: All of the above, and your Character gets LIFE +5.
Cards in the enemy Field with the same SIZE as this card are sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
A random Follower in your Field gets ATK decreased by 30 minus your Character's LIFE (by a maximum of 9). That Follower gets STA increased by its ATK reduction (by a maximum of 9).

If you have a Darklore Character, your Character gets LIFE halved (rounding up). If this happens, the following effects are applied depending on this card's SIZE:  ● 2 or less: The first Follower in your Field gets ATK/STA increased by twice the LIFE decrease. This card gets SIZE +2 and is sent to the top of your Deck.  ● 3 or more: If there are Followers in your Field, the first Follower in your Grave is sent to the top of your Deck.
If there are Followers in your Hand and Field, a random Follower in your Hand or Field gets ATK +4, DEF +4, or STA +4 (randomly).
A random Follower in your Field gets ATK/DEF/STA increased by the number of other Followers in your Field without skills and gets SIZE +1.
A random Follower in your Field is reactivated. The last Follower in the enemy Field gets STA decreased by the reactivated Follower's ATK minus 1.
If the last Follower in your Deck has "Lady" or "Maid" in the name, that Follower is sent to the first empty Slot in your hand and gets ATK +2/STA +2.
If you won the coin flip, all Spells in the enemy Field are deactivated. If you lost the coin flip, two random Followers in your Field get ATK -2/STA -2.
A random Follower in the enemy Field gets DEF =0. All Followers in the enemy Hand get DEF decreased by the change in DEF.
A random enemy Follower without skills is sent to the top of the enemy Deck.
A random Follower in the enemy Field gets its skills removed. If this happens, a random Follower in your Field gets its original skills restored.
Cards with "Blue Cross" in the name are sent from the top of your Deck to your Hand until your Hand has at least 4 cards. All allied Followers get ATK/STA increased by the number of sent cards.
Two random Followers in your Field get ATK increased by the number of cards in the enemy Hand.
Any cards with "GS", "Aletheian", or "Apostle" in the first 3 cards in your Deck get SIZE -1. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by the total SIZE decrease.

All Spells in your Grave are removed from the game. A number of cards named "Zombie" equal to 2 plus the number of removed cards are created at the top of your Grave. A random enemy Follower gets STA decreased by half the number of "Zombie" cards in your Grave (rounding up, by a maximum of 6).

All cards in both Hands and Fields get SIZE =2. All Followers in your Hand get SIZE -1. Two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK decreased by the total number of cards in both Hands and Fields with a SIZE of 2 (to a minimum of 0) and get STA decreased by half of that amount (rounding down).
자신필드 카드이름에 “요리연구부”가 들어간 추종자는 원래 사이즈와 현재 사이즈의 차이만큼 각각 공/체 증가.
자신필드 사이즈가 가장 큰 공립소속 추종자의 사이즈 -3. 해당추종자의 체력 -1.
상대필드 3번째 슬롯의 카드는 상대 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다. 상대 덱 맨 위에서 3번째 추종자를 상대필드 3번째 슬롯으로 옮긴다. 자신 캐릭터가 공립 소속일 경우 해당추종자의 사이즈 +3. 체력 -3.
자신필드 사립추종자 수만큼 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 방어력 감소.
자신필드/핸드 카드 중 사립소속이 아닌 랜덤한 카드 1은 무덤으로 간다. 그랬을경우 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1은 무덤으로 간다.
자신핸드 카드 수만큼 상대필드 추종자 전체 공격력 감소. 자신핸드 사립 추종자 카드 수만큼 자신필드 추종자 전체 방어력 증가.
상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 방어력 -3. 해당추종자의 방어력이 0이상일경우 추가로 방어력 -2.
자신필드 랜덤한 추종자 1을 행동종료상태로 한다. 그랬을경우 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1을 상대 덱 맨 위로 보낸다.
자신필드 첫번째 추종자를 사이즈 =1, 체력 =1하여 상대필드 첫번째 빈 슬롯에 배치한다. 해당카드의 감소된 체력만큼 상대필드 추종자 전체 체력 감소(최대 5). 감소된 사이즈만큼 자신캐릭터의 라이프 감소. 자신 캐릭터 카드가 크룩스 소속일 경우 최대값은 8이 된다.
자신필드 3번 슬롯에 위치한 다크로어 추종자는 자신필드 추종자 수만큼 방어력이 증가한다.(최대 3)
자신필드 사이즈가 가장 높은 첫번째 다크로어추종자를 제외한 추종자 전체 자신무덤으로 간다. 무덤에 간 추종자의 사이즈 합만큼 해당카드의 공/체 증가. 증가치의 절반(올림)만큼 방어력과 사이즈 증가.
자신필드 다크로어소속이 아닌 추종자 전체와 상대필드 추종자 전체 공/방/체 -2. 전체필드 방어력이 0이하인 추종자 전체 공/체 -2/-1.
상대 필드 추종자 전체는 10을 상대 필드 추종자 수 +1로 나눈 수치(올림)만큼 체력이 감소한다.
자신 덱에서 사이즈가 가장 작은 카드 1을 게임에서 제거한다. 해당 카드의 사이즈만큼 자신 캐릭터의 라이프 증가.
자신 필드 맨 앞의 추종자를 자신 필드 맨 뒤의 빈공간으로 이동시킨다. 이동한 슬롯의 차이만큼 상대 덱 맨 위 4장의 추종자 체력 감소.
자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 특수능력을 모두 삭제 후 "방어 전 이 카드의 원래 특수능력이 되는 특수능력이 된다." 특수능력을 부여한다.
자신 핸드의 빈공간 수 만큼 자신 덱 맨 밑에 있는 스펠을 자신 핸드로 이동시킨다.
상대 필드 빈 공간에 상대 핸드 스펠을 차례대로 배치한다. 그랬을 경우 이동한 스펠 수만큼 자신 캐릭터 라이프 감소. 자신 캐릭터가 사립소속일 경우 라이프는 감소하지 않는다.
자신 필드 추종자 2의 공/방/체는 -1~3 증가한다.
자신 필드에 추종자가 있을 경우 전체 필드의 랜덤한 추종자 1의 사이즈 =1. 체력=1
자신 캐릭터가 크룩스 소속일 경우 상대 필드의 랜덤한 카드 1매를 상대 덱 맨 위로 옮긴다. 해당 카드의 종류에 따라 이하의 효과를 적용한다.  ●추종자 : 자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/체 +2  ●스펠 : 이 카드를 자신 덱 맨 위로 옮긴다.
자신 필드 추종자 전체 행동종료 상태가 된다. 행동종료된 추종자의 수 만큼 랜덤한 상대 필드 추종자 1의 공격력 감소
전체 필드의 이 카드의 사이즈 이하의 추종자 체력 -4
자신 필드 빈공간에 사이즈=1, 공/방/체=7/0/1인 "좀비" 추종자 2장을 생성한다.
상대 필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/방/체를 원래 수치로 변경한 후 상대 덱 맨 위로 이동시킨다. 상대가 유저일 경우 셔플 +1
랜덤한 상대 필드 추종자 1의 체력은 절반(올림)이 된다. 추종자의 방어력이 3 미만일 경우 해당 추종자의 체력 +3.
랜덤한 상대 필드 추종자 1의 공격력=0. “턴 개시 시 이 추종자의 공격력은 원래 공격력 +3이 된다. 이 특수능력은 사라진다” 특수능력이 추가된다.
자신 캐릭터가 공립 소속일 경우 상대 필드 추종자가 놓인 슬롯번호 x 2만큼 상대 추종자 공,체 감소
상대핸드 스펠 전체 사이즈 +1.
상대필드의 방어력이 3이상(자신 캐릭터가 사립 소속일 경우 2 이상)인 추종자 전체는 모든 특수능력을 잃는다. 그랬을 경우 해당 추종자의 방어력은 두배가 된다.
자신 캐릭터가 사립소속일 경우 자신필드 전체는 행동종료 상태가 되고 상대필드 추종자 전체는 상대 덱 맨 밑으로 올라간다. 그랬을 경우 이동한 추종자 수-1만큼 상대필드에 사이즈=1의 "속박"이 행동종료 상태로 배치된다.
자신필드 체력이 가장 낮은 추종자1을 공격력 +2하여 상대필드 첫번째 빈 슬롯으로 옮긴다.
상대 핸드 추종자 전체 체력 -3(0이하가 되지 않는다.)
자신/상대필드 전체 크룩스 추종자의 공/방/체는 원래의 수치+1가 된다. 크룩스 소속이 아닌 추종자 공/방/체는 원래의 수치-2가 된다.
10 - 자신필드 카드의 사이즈 합만큼 (최대 5)까지 상대 랜덤한 추종자1의 체력이 감소한다
상대의 빈 핸드 슬롯에 잘 부탁드립니다.1장을 배치한다.
상대 캐릭터의 라이프에 따라 이하의 효과를 전부 적용한다.  ●15 이상 : 상대 필드 랜덤한 스펠1 무덤 보낸다.자신의 셔플수+1 ●6이상 :상대 필드 카드 전체 사이즈+1. 상대의 셔플수-1  ●5이하 : 상대캐릭터의 라이프 =1
자신 덱에 "밀실탐사" 카드가 존재할 경우 해당 카드를 자신 덱 맨 위로 이동시킨다. 자신 필드에 이 카드만 존재할 경우, 자신 덱 맨 위의 카드 2장을 자신 필드 빈공간으로 이동시킨다.
랜덤한 자신 필드 추종자 1의 공/체는 원래 수치+2가 된다. 방어력은 원래 수치 -1이 된다.
자신 셔플수가 0일 경우 셔플수 =1, 자신 덱 맨 밑의 카드 2장을 자신 덱 맨 위로 이동시킨 후, 스펠일 경우 사이즈 -1, 추종자일 경우 공/체 +1.
공/방/체 합이 원래 공/방/체 합과 동일한 상대 필드 첫번째 추종자는 상대 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다.
상대 공/방/체 중 증가한 수치가 존재하는 추종자 중 랜덤한 추종자 1은 증가한 공/방/체 중 랜덤한 수치가 원래 수치가 된다.
자신 캐릭터가 사립 소속일 경우 상대 캐릭터와 소속이 다른 상대 덱 맨 위의 카드는 게임에서 제거된 후 상대 덱 맨 위에 이 카드를 생성한다. 자신 캐릭터가 사립 이외의 소속일 경우 자신 캐릭터 라이프 +1.
자신/상대 필드의 추종자의 공격 전 특수능력은 모두 사라진다.
자신 필드 랜덤한 크룩스 추종자 1의 특수능력은 모두 사라진 후 "방어 전 공격 추종자는 게임에서 제거된다. 이 카드는 무덤으로 간다." 특수능력이 추가된다.
자신 필드 크룩스 소속 추종자 수에 따라 다음 효과가 발동한다.  ●1: 자신 필드 빈 슬롯수만큼 상대 필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/방/체 감소  ●2: 자신 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 +2  ●3 이상: 자신 필드 전체 사이즈 합의 절반(내림)만큼 자신 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 증가
이 카드의 사이즈 이하인 랜덤한 상대 필드 카드 1을 상대 덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다.
카드 이름에 "GS"가 들어간 자신 필드 추종자 수만큼 전체 추종자 체력 감소. 감소치의 두배만큼 전체 추종자 공격력 증가
자신 캐릭터가 다크로어 소속이고 상대 필드에 스펠카드가 존재할 경우 상대 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 -3. 상대 필드에 스펠카드가 없을 경우 자신 캐릭터의 라이프 -2.
자신/상대 필드의 카드 소속 종류 수의 절반(올림)만큼 자신 필드 카드 전체 사이즈 감소, 방어력 증가. 수만큼 자신 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 증가. 두배만큼 자신 무덤 맨 위에서부터 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 옮긴다. 이 카드는 게임에서 제거된다.
전체 필드 추종자는 자신의 첫번째 특수능력만 남는다. 자신 필드 추종자는 각각 없어진 특수능력 수만큼 공/방/체 증가
자신 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 +1. 3-증가한 추종자 수 만큼 상대 캐릭터 라이프 감소.
상대 덱 맨 위의 카드 를 최대 2매 차례대로 상대 필드 빈 슬롯으로 꺼낸다. 추종자일 경우 추종자의 공격력은 5가 되고, 특수능력은 "턴 개시 시 이 카드는 덱 맨 위로 올라간다." 특수능력이 된다.
자신 필드에 추종자가 3장 이상 있을 경우 자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자 3의 공격력은 가장 높은 공격력 수치와 가장 낮은 공격력 수치의 합의 절반(올림)이 된다.
자신 핸드 이름에 "메이드"가 들어간 랜덤한 추종자 1은 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다. 그랬을 경우 상대 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/방/체는 상대 필드의 가장 낮은 공/방/체가 된다.
자신 캐릭터 소속이 사립 소속일 경우 이름에 "메이드"가 들어가는 추종자를 자신 덱 맨 위에서부터 자신 필드 빈 공간에 배치한다. 그랬을 경우 해당 추종자들의 사이즈 =2.
자신 덱 맨 위의 카드가 추종자일 경우 사이즈 -1, 공/체 +2 하여 자신 핸드 빈 슬롯으로 이동한다.
자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자 1은 이하의 특수능력 중 랜덤한 하나가 추가된다. "공격 전 이 카드의 공격력 +3", "공격 전 이 카드의 공격력 -1", "공격 전 이 카드의 체력 +3"
자신 필드에 특수능력을 보유한 랜덤한 추종자 1의 특수능력은 모두 사라지고 자신 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다. 그랬을 경우 상대 필드에 특수능력이 있는 추종자와 랜덤한 스펠 1은 상대 덱 맨 밑으로 이동한다.
자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자 2의 체력 +4,5
상대 필드에 스펠카드가 2장 이상일 경우 상대 필드 랜덤한 카드 1을 파괴한다.
상대 필드 랜덤한 스펠카드 1을 상대 덱 맨 위로 옮긴다. 상대 필드 카드 전체 행동종료 상태가 된다.
이 카드를 발동시키기 위해서는 카나의 봉인을 풀어야 합니다.
자신 덱 아래의 4장의 카드 중 추종자 수보다 작은 사이즈의 상대 필드 첫번째 스펠 카드를 게임에서 제거한다. 자신 덱 맨 위의 "파인딩 라이브러리" 카드를 자신 덱 맨 위로 이동시킨다.
자신 필드 이름에 "레이디"가 들어가고 사이즈가 3 이상인 추종자 전체 사이즈 -1. 공격력 +1. 사이즈가 3이하인 경우 해당 카드의 사이즈만큼 체력 증가. 이 카드는 행동종료 상태로 필드에 남는다.
전체 필드 추종자의 방어 전 특수능력은 "방어 전 이 카드는 아무 효과도 발동하지 않는다" 특수능력이 된다. 해당 카드가 크룩스 소속일 경우 공/체 +1. 카드의 이름에 "청십자회"가 들어갈 경우 추가로 방/체 +1
자신의 덱 맨 밑의 카드 2장을 무덤으로 보낸다. 자신 덱 맨 위의 GS 가 들어간 추종자를 자신 필드 첫번째 빈 슬롯에 배치한다. 해당 카드의 공/체 +2
자신 필드 시즌 종류수만큼 자신 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 증가. 상대 필드 시즌 종류수만큼 상대 필드 추종자 전체 공/체 감소
자신필드 추종자 전체 자신 핸드 카드수 +2 만큼 체력 증가.
자신 덱에 있는 추종자 전체 사이즈-1. 공/체-1.
랜덤한 상대 덱 카드 2장의 사이즈는 2배가 된다. 랜덤한 자신 덱 카드 2장의 사이즈는 절반(내림)이 된다.
상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 공/방/체는 원래의 수치가 된다. 해당 증가치만큼 자신필드 랜덤한 추종자1의 공/방/체 증가.
자신필드 랜덤한 사립소속 추종자1의 사이즈-1 공/방/체 +1 상대필드 랜덤한 추종자 1의 사이즈+1 공/방/체-1.
자신무덤 맨 위의 카드 5장을 제거하고 자신필드에서 체력이 가장 낮은 추종자1을 행동종료 상태로 한다. 그랬을 경우 상대 필드에서 체력이 가장 높은 추종자1을 행동종료 상태로 한다. 두 추종자의 체력은 서로의 체력차이만큼 감소한다. 감소치의 절반(내림)만큼 상대필드 카드 전체 체력 감소.
턴 수가 홀수, 셔플 수가 홀수, 이 카드의 슬롯 번호가 홀수일 경우 자신의 무덤 랜덤한 스펠1을 필드로 가져온다. 이 카드는 게임에서 제거된다.
상대 덱 맨 밑의 카드 1장을 무덤으로 보낸다. 해당 카드가 스펠일 경우 랜덤한 아군 추종자2는 공/체 +1/+2. 추종자일 경우 방어력 -1.
상대 필드 홀수 슬롯의 카드를 행동종료 시킨다. 행동종료 상태된 추종자의 공/체는 행동종료된 카드 수 만큼 감소한다. 행동종료된 상태된 카드 수+1만큼 자신 필드 추종자 2의 공/체 증가.
자신 필드 랜덤한 추종자1의 공격력=0. 변화치 만큼 상대 필드 랜덤한 추종자1의 체력 감소.
공/방/체 합이 상대 캐릭터의 라이프 보다 높은 상대필드 추종자 1은 행동종료 상태가 된다. 해당 추종자의 공/방/체는 자신 캐릭터 라이프의 절반(내림)이 된다.
자신 캐릭터가 다크로어 소속일 경우 상대 필드 랜덤한 카드1을 상대 덱 맨 아래로 이동 시킨다. 이 카드의 사이즈=2로 하여 행동종료 상태로 필드에 남는다. 이 카드의 사이즈가 2이하일 경우 상대필드 랜덤한 카드2를 상대 덱 맨위로 이동 시킨 후 이 카드를 게임에서 제거한다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Hidden Truth

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Dress Up!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, allied Followers with "Dress Up Maron" in the name are sent to the Grave if there is a card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" in the name. Next, the first card in your Deck with "Dress Up Maron" is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that Follower gets SIZE =5/ATK +3/STA +3, and then this card is sent to your Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Heartful Catch!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, other allied cards with "Dress Up Maron" in the name are sent to your Grave. Next, the first card in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name is sent to your Grave. If there are no cards in your Hand with "Dress Up" in the name, the first card in your Grave with "Dress Up" in the name is removed from the game. CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 자신 핸드에 도서부가 들어간 카드수 -1만큼 자신의 공/체 증가. 이 능력은 다음 턴 개시시 원래대로 돌아오는 능력으로 변한다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 역경극복
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 자신의 방어력이 1 이하일 경우 자신의 체력 +3

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 일도양단
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 방어 추종자의 체력 -3. 이 특수능력은 사라진다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 집단이용
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 상대 필드 추종자 수만큼 체력 증가

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 주종맹약
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶턴 개시시 이 추종자의 체력은 자신 캐릭터의 라이프와 같아진다.(최대15) 이 특수능력은 사라진다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 출혈
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 이 추종자의 공/방/체 중 랜덤한 수치 1 감소

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 귀환
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 이 추종자는 자신 덱 맨 위로 옮긴다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 기억상실
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 이 추종자는 모든 특수능력을 잃는다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 방어의윤회
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 이 추종자의 방어력에 따라 이하의 효과를 적용한다. 1 이하 : 방어력=2. 2 : 방어력 =3 . 3 이상 : 방어력=1

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 어둠의파괴
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 자신 캐릭터가 다크로어 소속일 경우 방어 추종자의 방어력 -1

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 동료의존
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 자신핸드에 스펠이 추종자보다 적을 경우 공/체 +1

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 희생방어
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶방어 전 체력 -2. 랜덤한 자신 필드 다크로어 소속 추종자 1의 공/체 +2

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 원조
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 자신 캐릭터의 라이프 +1. 이 특수능력은 다음 턴 개시시 원래 능력으로 돌아오는 능력으로 변한다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 자기희생
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶턴 개시시 이 추종자의 공/방/체 -1

CARD_SKILL.NAME: 유아독존
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶공격 전 이 카드 이외의 자신필드 추종자 전체 방어력 -1. 그랬을 경우 감소한 수치만큼 이 카드의 공/체 증가. 이 특수능력은 다음 턴 개시시 원래 능력으로 돌아오는 능력으로 변한다.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Position Change!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Sword Girls" in the name gets its original skills restored and is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, that card gets STA +3 and this card is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Song of Hope!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, all allied Followers get ATK +2/STA +1, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Song of Cheer!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, all allied Followers get STA +3, this card gets SIZE -1, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Song of Will!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, all allied Followers get DEF +1/STA +2, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Song of Love!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, all allied Followers get SIZE -1, this card gets STA +2, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Penguin Strikes Back
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied cards with "Sita" in the name:  ● 1: DEF =1/STA +1  ● 2: DEF =2/STA +2  ● 3 or more: DEF =2/STA +3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Panda Beam!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied cards with "Cinia" in the name:  ● 1: ATK -1/STA -1  ● 2: ATK -1/STA -2  ● 3 or more: ATK -2/STA -3

CARD_SKILL.NAME: I want to be a bear!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied cards with "Luthica" in the name:  ● 1: ATK +1/STA +1  ● 2: ATK +1/STA +2  ● 3 or more: ATK +2/STA +3

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Ultimate Rabbit!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender gets one of the following effects applied depending on the number of allied cards with "Iri' in the name:  ● 1: STA -2  ● 2: STA -3  ● 3 or more: STA -4

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Lethargy
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK -1

CARD_SKILL.NAME: My Liver...
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA -3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Tough Defense
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA +3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Enhance Defense
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, this card gets DEF +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Flash Shield
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding up), and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Let's go, Council!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, allied Followers with "Council" in the name get ATK +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Come on, Council!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, allied Followers with "Council" in the name get STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Maid Call
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the first card in your Deck with "Maid' in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. This card gets ATK/STA increased by half of the sent card's SIZE (rounding up), and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Guardian Artifact
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets ATK +3/STA +3, and then this skill is sent to the first Follower in your Deck with "Seeker" in the name that does not have this skill.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Thirst for Knowledge
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random card in your Hand with "Witch" in the name gets SIZE -1, and then this card gets a copy of that card's first skill.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Takoyaki and Noodles
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random other allied Vita Follower gets ATK +3-5/STA +3-5 (random). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Accident!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random other allied Academy Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the number of Followers in your Hand and Field (by a maximum of 5). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Red Sun
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random other allied Crux Follower gets ATK/STA increased by the total DEF of allied Followers with a DEF of least 1 (by a maximum of 5). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Witch Hunt
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random other allied Darklore Follower gets ATK/STA increased by half of your Hand SIZE (by a maximum of 5, rounding up). If this happens, your Character gets LIFE -1, and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Delay!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender's skills are removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Delay!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the attacker's skills are removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Delay!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, a random Follower in the enemy Hand gets its skills removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Best Attack
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1-3. (Randomly)

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Best Defense
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA +1-3. (Randomly)

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Summon Member!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a random card in your Grave with "Lib." in the name is sent to the bottom of your Deck.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Underground Exploration!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by the number of cards in the bottom four cards in your Deck with "Lib." in the name and gets ATK increased by half of the STA increase (rounding down).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Press Campaign!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if the attacker's ATK is less than or equal to the number of Vita Followers in your Grave, the attacker is sent to the Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Guarantee!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, the first Vita Follower in your Grave is removed from the game.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Lady Ready!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by the number of other cards in your Hand and Field with "Lady" in the name and gets ATK increased by half of that amount (rounding down).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Witch Cheer!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it and Followers in your Hand with "Witch" in the name get STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Hot Winds! Hurricane!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the following effects are applied depending on the number of cards in your Hand and Field with "Lady" in the name, and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn:  ● 2-3: This card gets ATK +3/STA +3.  ● 5 or more: All Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -2/STA -2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Defense Sink!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets DEF changed to equal this card's DEF.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sacred Shield!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if there are at least two cards in your Field with "Seeker" in the name, cards in your Field with "Seeker" in the name get STA +4, and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Rear Maneuver!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets STA increased by the SIZE of the first card in your Hand. The first card in your Hand gets SIZE -2 and is sent to the top of your Deck. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Attack Roulette!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK = 1-10 (randomly).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Health Roulette!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA = 1-10 (randomly).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: My body is a shield!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if it has an ATK of at least 1, it gets ATK -1/STA +3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sacrifice!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if there are no other Followers in your Field, this card gets ATK +1/STA +1. Otherwise, the first other Follower in your Field is sent to the Grave and this card gets the following effects applied depending on the sent Follower:  ● Darklore faction: ATK +2/STA +2.  ● "Aletheian" in the name: ATK +3/STA +3  ● Neither of the above: STA +3

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Time Control!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if the Turn Number is odd, it gets STA increased by the attacker's ATK.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Mind Control!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, if this card is active, it is sent to the first empty Slot in the enemy Field, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Investigation!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if the Turn Number is even, it gets ATK +1/STA +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Ack!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets STA=1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Super Eight!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK =8.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Attack Sink!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, its ATK gets changed to equal 2 plus the defender's DEF.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Best Three!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets STA -3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Phase Shift!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its total DEF and STA are less than the attacker's ATK, this card is removed from the game and a new copy is created in the first empty Slot in your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE changed to equal this card's SIZE -1, gets ATK +2/STA +2, and is deactivated. If this card's SIZE is 2 or less and you have a Vita Character, the attacker is sent to the Grave. If you do not have a Vita Character, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is sent to the Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Status Change!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, this card gets SIZE decreased by the number of cards in your Hand with "Witch" in the name, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Neutralize!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender's skills that contain "Before this card attacks" are removed, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Harden!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, this card gets DEF +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Shield Support!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets DEF =0 and a random Follower in your Field with "Witch" in the name gets ATK/STA increased by the change in DEF.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Phase Shift!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its total DEF and STA are less than the attacker's ATK, this card is removed from the game and a new copy is created in the first empty Slot in your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE changed to equal this card's SIZE -1 and is deactivated, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck, and the attacker gets STA decreased by the sent Spell's SIZE. If this card's SIZE is 3 or less and you have an Academy Character, the attacker is sent to the Grave. If you do not have an Academy Character, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is sent to the Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sanctuary Call!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the first Spell in your Deck with "Sanctuary" in the name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field. If this happens, this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sanctuary Burst!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK increased by the number of cards in your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sanctuary Return!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, cards in your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name are reactivated, and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Phase Shift!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its total DEF and STA are less than the attacker's ATK, this card is removed from the game and a new copy is created in the first empty Slot in your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE change to equal this card's SIZE +1 and is deactivated, and the first other Follower in your Field with a SIZE of at least 2 get SIZE -2. If this Follower has a SIZE of at least 3 and you have a Crux Character, the attacker is sent to the Grave. If you do not have an Crux Character, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is sent to the Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Boost!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its total DEF and STA is less than the attacker's ATK, a random Darklore Follower in your Field gets ATK +2/STA +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sacrifice's Reward!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the first Follower in your Hand with "Aletheian" in the name is sent to the Grave. If this happens, this card gets STA increased by the sent Follower's STA (by a maximum of 6).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Phase Shift!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its total DEF and STA are less than the attacker's ATK, this card is removed from the game and a new copy is created in the first empty Slot in your Field. The new Follower gets SIZE changed to equal this card's SIZE -1 and is deactivated, and all Followers in the enemy Field get STA decreased by half of this card's SIZE (rounding up). If this card has a SIZE of 3 or less and you have a Darklore Character, the attacker is sent to the Grave. If you do not have a Darklore Character, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck. This card is sent to the Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Phase Shift!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if this card's total DEF and STA is less than the attacker's ATK, this card is removed from the game and a new copy of this card is created in the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated. If you have no remaining Shuffles, you get Shuffles +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Council's Blessing!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, up to two Vita cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the bottom. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2 and the first other Follower in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Brilliant Idea!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, up to two Darklore cards in your Grave are removed from the game, starting from the bottom. If this happens, two random Followers in the enemy Field get ATK -1/DEF -1/STA -2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Attack Charge!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +1/STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: First Aid!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets STA +3. If there are Followers in your Field that do not have this skill, this skill is sent to a random Follower in your Field that does not have this skill.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Hemorrhage Curse!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets STA -2, and then this skill is sent to the defender.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Pierce!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender gets STA decreased by this card's ATK minus the defender's DEF. This card is moved to the first empty Slot in your Field and deactivated. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Song of Vitality!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a Follower in Slot 3 in your Field gets ATK +1/STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Burst!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets ATK +2/STA +2, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Curse!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA -2, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Rewind!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, a random Follower in your Grave is sent to the bottom of your Deck, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Half Price!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the attacker gets ATK/STA decreased by half of this card's SIZE (rounding up).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Sanctuary Press!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the first card in the enemy Deck gets SIZE increased by half of the number of cards in your Field with "Sanctuary" in the name (rounding up), and then this skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Soul Bounce!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the first other deactivated card in your Field is sent to the top of your Deck. If this happens, the attacker is sent to the top of the enemy Deck and deactivated. If this happens, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Curse of Unity!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if there are no cards in your Field with "Aletheian" in the name, it gets ATK -1/DEF -1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Take Cover!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if it is deactivated, the attacker is sent to the bottom of the enemy Deck and deactivated. If this happens, this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: HP Boost!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, it gets STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Blood Rebellion!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if its STA is at least 6, it gets STA =5. The attacker gets ATK/DEF decreased by the STA reduction. If this happens, this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Destruction!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, this card is destroyed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Absolute Shield!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if its DEF is less than 0, its DEF is multiplied by -1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Break
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, all Followers in your Field get DEF -1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Erupting Potential!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets ATK +2/DEF +2/STA +2, and then this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Dissonance!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, all other Followers in your Field get STA -1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Law of Nature!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender switches Slots with the Follower in the enemy Field with the the lowest STA. If the new defender's total DEF and STA is less than or equal to this card's ATK, this card gets ATK +2/STA +2.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Strike Weakness!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if the defender does not have a skill that states "Before this card is attacked," the defender gets DEF -1/STA -1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Defense Spin!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender gets DEF and STA decreased to their original values. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Attack Spin!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, the defender gets ATK and DEF decreased to their original values. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Diet Failure!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if there are two or fewer cards in your Hand, it gets SIZE +2. If there are at least four cards in your Hand, this skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Berserker!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets ATK increased by half of the attacker's ATK (rounding up) and gets STA increased by half of the ATK increase (rounding down).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Disruption!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, if it is deactivated, the attacker gets ATK -2/STA +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Now is Then!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, if you have a Darklore Character, all Followers in your Field get their original skills restored.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Knowledge Use!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, Followers in your Field with "Witch" in the name get STA +2. This skill is removed.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Forced Transformation!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the defender is changed into a Follower named "Guide Rio" while retaining its ATK/DEF/STA/SIZE and skills, and then gets ATK/DEF/STA decreased by the number of enemy cards with "Rio" in the name.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Fake Slumber!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it is reactivated.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: I'm Done Warming Up!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, this card gets ATK/DEF/STA increased to their original values.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Clone Technique!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, a new copy of this card is created in your Grave.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Copy Evasion!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card is attacked, it gets STA increased by the number of cards in your Grave with the same name (by a maximum of 3).

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Summon Magic!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶At the start of the turn, the first Follower in your Deck with "Dress Up" in the name that does not have this card's name is sent to the first empty Slot in your Field, and then this card is sent to the Grave. The sent Follower gets SIZE=5/ATK +3/STA +3.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Curse Attack!
CARD_SKILL.TEXT: ▶Before this card attacks, the first Spell in the enemy Hand is sent to the top of the enemy Deck. If this happens, the defender gets ATK -1/STA -1. Otherwise, the defender gets STA -2. This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Curse Shift!

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Letter's Curse!

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Letter's Misery!

This card and a random other Follower in your Field get DEF increased by the number of sent cards. If your Character has "Rose" in the name, those Followers get an additional ATK +1.

CARD_SKILL.NAME: Shaman's Majestic Dance!

This skill is removed until the start of the next turn.
